Excellent interpersonal skills.     Ability to work well under pressure.

column2: As an E-commerce Sales Marketing Executive, you will contribute to E-Commerce marketing (US-based marketplaces) efforts to accelerate our growth through our eCommerce shop, third-party marketplaces (e.g., Walmart stores, Google shopping, and more), and help promote the products via Social Media, influencer marketing, affiliate marketing, and other innovative ways per your experience.                  You will help continue to build the eCommerce business and capabilities with a clear focus on expanding our social media channels, email marketing, and optimization across all of our sales channels.      You will achieve sales growth by leading the development of digital marketing strategies, tactics, and best practices across all    sales channels.      You will manage, improve, and optimize the e-commerce performance of marketing programs to drive tangible growth in sales.                    Key Responsibilities as an E-commerce Sales and Marketing Executive (US Market)                        Build and execute eCommerce marketing campaigns including campaign setup, execution, and optimization (i.e. own site, marketplace, email, SMS, social media, affiliate marketing, etc).              Manage daily operations for eCommerce including updating listings on all marketplaces like Amazon, Walmart, Wayfair, CVS, Walgreens, Staples, Costco, and others.              Setup execute paid advertisement on Amazon, Walmart, Google shopping and other marketplaces              Manage and optimize all marketing channels including e-commerce, social media, digital, Amazon, Walmart, Google Shopping, and any other cutting-edge ways you bring to the table.              Building and executing social media marketing strategies.              Develop e-commerce creatives to ensure the e-commerce experience is o the brand to promote acquisition, sales, and retention.              Update website banners, custom landing pages, and other content needs.              Test and ensure accuracy of all site assets, links, promotions, and marketing content for the site.              Updating, and providing insights on, core reporting processes that detail the various aspects of product performance.              Reporting on various performance matrices demonstrating the KPIs.              This role is to manage the US-based marketplace places and therefore, may require some days (not everyday) availability as per the US timezone for the team meetings.                    Requirements for an E-commerce Sales and Marketing Executive (US Market)            Bachelor s degree in marketing or related field and 2+ years of experience in marketing, eCommerce, or digital marketing preferred          Should have process knowledge of Retail Ads Marketing.              Proven experience managing marketing programs in an eCommerce, digital marketing, or marketing environment.              Passion for digital and the eCommerce space. Demonstrated understanding of digital marketing strategies and tactics.              Knowledge of paid platforms, e-commerce marketplace ad platforms, and/or digital marketing tools.          Strong PC skills (Windows, Word, Excel, PowerPoint)      Experience with Google Analytics, UX, or Adobe.      Strong organizational and project management skills.      Must have global exposure to the online retail market    Soft Skills    Proficiency in English      Self-reliant and quick learner      Exposure to asynchronous working      Creative and efficient problem solver      Strong critical and logical thinking.    You have a very higher chance of grabbing this position:    If you have been part of the Amazon/Wallmart seller advertising      If you are familiar with online retail-specific to the US market      If you take initiative and work independently.      Excellent marketing sales technique with communication skills              What is the future scope of the E-commerce industry                The Ecommerce industry offers huge opportunities for entrepreneurs and marketers. The rising online business has made it possible for people to own their businesses, build a presence and start selling their products or services online.      This is no longer confined to the brick and mortar stores but has become an important part of our lives.      According to Forbes the global e-commerce market will reach $4 trillion by 2022 , from a total $1.8 trillion in 2017 this yearly growth (CAGR) is in line with that predicted for retail overall, projected at 3.4% through 2022.                  What are the skills required for e-commerce executive                To succeed as an e-commerce executive, you need a variety of skills. For example, you ll need excellent communication and interpersonal skills for developing relationships with customers, vendors and other stakeholders.      You also need to possess strong organizational abilities to manage payments, inventory and logistics. Finally, strong analytical skills are necessary for analyzing data on trends in the industry and customer behavior.                How to find an Ecommerce marketing job in surat        Are you an eCommerce marketer looking for the best e-commerce marketing jobs in suratWe are one of the best e-commerce marketing agencies in surat. With our unique approach, we help all-sized e-commerce brands establish a digital presence that drives growth in revenue, and conversion rates and add value to your brand.            Are eCommerce marketing specialist jobs stressful                No, eCommerce marketing specialist jobs can be very rewarding. As eCommerce continues to grow and thrive, the demand for qualified professionals to manage the various components of a successful online business has grown exponentially.      So, this creates what we like to call a win-win situation: The right person in the right place at the right time can change many aspects of their life by working as an eCommerce marketing specialist.                  What is the Ecommerce Marketing Executive average salary for freshers in India                The average e-commerce marketing executive salary in India is any amount ranging from 10,000 to 20,000 per month. Each experience level has a different range of salary.            Recruiting Process at EnactOn          You re considering applying for a job. What happens nextLearn more about your upcoming recruiting journey.              Submit an application      Our recruiting team will review your application and take a follow-up within a week about whether we will look forward to your application.                  Recruiter phone interview      The recruiter will set up a phone call to know more about you and answer your questions. You should not expect any feedback at this stage.                  Assessment      You may receive a content assignment depends on the position you re applying for. It gives a better idea of what a job is like.                  Face to Face Interview      You will interview with Enacters who have prepared to ask you thoughtful questions. It s only for the candidates who cleared the assessment.                  Decision Stage      After a detailed brief, you receive an offer. If not, we provide candidates with thoughtful feedbacks for future interviews.                Onboarding      After you accept an offer, our recruiting team will guide you through the onboarding process.              Benefits and perks    Hardworking people who constantly add value to the company deserve great support. That s why we are maintaining flexible culture and exceptional learning experience for all our employees.          Intern development program    To get started, training and mentoring are essential to any college student. For every new hire, we have several structured internship programs designed to transform them into professional employees.        Decent payout    We do take care of employee s needs and value their importance. We offer a competitive payout, incentives bonuses. Our interns are getting decent pay as well.        Remote Work    You don t only need to be office or at a desk to show impact. You can choose to work from home or office with our hybrid working model.        Time off    We do believe in a healthy work-life balance. An assortment of leaves allows employees to enjoy some time off from work with their families and friends. Be it on vacation or sick leaves.        Fun stuff    We do not miss any treats, get together and celebrations. There is no shortage of fun when you work at Enacton. Work hard and party harder!

column2: Hiring Marketing Executive! Role Overview: As a Marketing Executive, you will take the lead in crafting and executing marketing strategies to boost the recognition of our products/services and strengthen our brand presence. Your role will involve active participation in conferences, webinars, and training sessions. Additionally, you'll be responsible for nurturing client and vendor relationships, while also providing leadership to steer our marketing team towards achieving key objectives. Key Responsibilities: * Develop and execute comprehensive marketing strategies aligned with business objectives. * Actively participate in conferences, webinars, and training sessions to showcase our products/services and enhance knowledge. * Manage client relationships to ensure exceptional satisfaction and retention. * Oversee vendor relationships and negotiate contracts for optimal cost-effectiveness. * Lead and inspire a team of marketing professionals to meet targets and drive results. * Cultivate team engagement through open communication and collaborative efforts. * Utilize email communication and digital marketing channels to effectively reach target audiences. * Analyze marketing data and metrics to continuously track performance and refine campaigns for maximum impact. Qualifications: * MBA/BE degree in Marketing or related field. * Proven experience in marketing roles with 2 to 3 years of experience in IT sector. * Strong communication and interpersonal skills. * Excellent organizational and project management abilities. * Ability to multitask and work effectively in a fast-paced environment. * Excellent communication skills. * Proficiency in digital marketing tools and platforms is preferred. Join Us! Let's Grow Together!

column2: Hello!!!!! Future Brand Development Associates About Us: Echobooom conducts a symphony of success, transforming businesses into harmonious ensembles that captivate audiences and create a lasting impact. By joining Echobooom, you enter a realm where mediocrity is banished and greatness is embraced. We offer a vibrant ecosystem where innovation thrives, talents flourish, and dreams turn into reality. We are looking for an energetic Brand development Associate to help drive our sales and grow the business. You will attract new clients and build solid relationships with them while maintaining existing relationships. Other duties will include market research, developing business strategies and pitches, managing a variety of projects, and identifying new business opportunities. You will work with various departments and report to the Head of Business Development. The successful applicant will be resourceful, organized and motivated to increase sales, enhance the company's reputation, and look for new and creative ways to market our products. A background in sales or marketing is strongly desirable. Responsibilities: Willing to familiarize yourself with the company's vision and mission, seeking to accomplish set goals and objectives. Conducting market research and identifying potential clients. Cultivating strong relationships with new clients, while maintaining existing client relationships. Collating and maintaining client information in the CRM database. Working closely with staff across departments to implement growth strategies. Developing and implementing sales strategies, client service and retention plans, and analyzing sales data to inform or update marketing strategies. Assist with drafting business plans, sales pitches, presentations, reference material, and other documents as required. Ability to manage multiple projects concurrently and meet deadlines. Identify new business opportunities and partners. Demonstrate strong interpersonal skills with the ability to engage effectively with various levels of management, staff, and clients. Requirements: Bachelor's degree in business management, marketing, or related field. 0 - 1 years' relevant work experience in business development or similar field preferred. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Ability to handle multiple projects simultaneously and work under pressure. Strong organization and project management skills. Friendly and personable demeanor. We are looking for immediate joiners to fill this position. Office Location - Rajouri Garden, New Delhi Join us at Echobooom and let your superpowers shine! Apply now by sharing your CV to HR, we look forward to hearing from you and discovering the potential of working together to achieve great things! You can share your CV on the given Email Address and WhatsApp Number, email Address - hr.kolkata@echobooom.com contact - 8240048918 Thanks & Regards, Naina ( Team Echobooom)

column2: SpJob Summary: The Marketing Operations Specialist will help design, build, and oversee the day-to-day-operations of our marketing tech stack. This role will focus on ensuring the effective use and integration of marketing technology investments, the efficient deployment of marketing campaigns, and the accuracy and completeness of the company and contact data in the marketing database. The Marketing Operations Specialist will be the system admin for the Marketing Automation Platform currently Hubspot providing structure and oversight to email programs, database hygiene, form and landing page creation, as well as the management of the lead lifecycle. Additionally, this role will work to integrate and optimize the entire marketing tech stack for maximum efficiency and data sharing. This role will also be responsible for marketing KPI metric reporting and dashboards.   Essential Functions: Mandatory In depth working experinece in HubSpot Automation & Google Analytics  3rd party integration with sales tool is must Should have knowlege of wordpress marketing tool Sales forece experience will be added advantage  ??Manage technical aspects of key marketing systems used to generate, distribute, and report on strategic marketing initiatives.  ??Become a power user of HubSpot and Salesforce.  ??Help manage lead data from online and offline sources and is a key player in maintaining data hygiene and integrity.  ??Establish, maintain, and improve scalable processes across systems that ensure best practices for the marketing team to perform optimally in respective roles.  ??Partner with internal stakeholders to define, maintain, and optimize the marketing tech stack.  ??Share responsibility for tracking, reporting, and analyzing the performance of marketing activities including A/B and Multi-variate tests.  ??Work with our Brand and Digital Marketing team to create emails, forms, landing pages, reports, and other related infrastructure to optimize performance of our digital marketing efforts across multiple touchpoints.  ??Provide administrative and project support for a variety of marketing programs.  ??Accountable for ensuring all final marketing collateral is added to the shared marketing document library.  ??Stay informed on developments in the marketing discipline and within our sphere of influence: new techniques, ideas, channels, strategies, etc., and identifies new and innovative opportunities. column2: Position Overview: We are seeking a talented and motivated Marketing Automation Specialist to join our dynamic marketing team. The Marketing Automation Specialist will play a critical role in designing, implementing, and optimizing marketing automation campaigns and workflows. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of marketing automation platforms, data analysis, and a passion for driving lead generation, customer engagement, and overall marketing efficiency. Key Responsibilities: Marketing Automation Campaigns: Create, deploy, and manage automated marketing campaigns using the marketing automation platform. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop campaign strategies, content, and assets. Build and optimize lead nurturing workflows to guide prospects through the customer journey. Data Management and Analysis: Segment and manage customer and prospect databases for targeted campaigns. Analyze campaign performance and engagement metrics to drive continuous improvement. Monitor and maintain data hygiene to ensure accuracy and compliance with data privacy regulations. Platform Management: Be the in-house expert on the marketing automation platform (e.g., Marketo, HubSpot, Pardot, etc.). Configure and troubleshoot automation workflows, email templates, landing pages, and forms. Implement best practices for data integration, synchronization, and lead scoring. Lead Generation and Nurturing: Develop and execute lead generation strategies that align with overall marketing goals. Design and optimize lead nurturing programs to increase conversion rates and sales readiness. Implement A/B testing to refine campaign elements and improve results. Collaboration and Communication: Work closely with content creators, designers, and digital marketing teams to align messaging and visuals. Collaborate with sales teams to ensure alignment on lead qualification criteria and lead handoff processes. Reporting and Insights: Generate regular reports on campaign performance, including key metrics and insights. Provide actionable recommendations based on data analysis to optimize campaign outcomes. Qualifications and Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or related field. Relevant certifications (e.g., Marketo Certified Expert, HubSpot Certification) are a plus. Proven experience (X years) in marketing automation, preferably within a B2B environment. Proficiency in using marketing automation platforms such as Marketo, HubSpot, Pardot, etc. Strong understanding of lead nurturing, segmentation, and customer journey mapping. Solid data analysis skills and ability to derive actionable insights from campaign metrics. Familiarity with CRM systems (e.g., Salesforce) and data integration processes. Excellent communication skills and ability to collaborate across teams. Detail-oriented with strong project management skills. Ability to adapt to a fast-paced and changing environment. If you're a dedicated Marketing Automation Specialist with a passion for leveraging automation to drive marketing success, we encourage you to apply and become a part of our team. Please submit your resume, cover letter, and any relevant certifications to [email address].

column2: ASSISTANT MARKETING MANAGER JD An Asst Marketing Manager/ Asst Brand Manager plays a critical role in shaping the image and perception of a company's products or services. Here's a comprehensive job description for such a role: Position Title:  Asst Marketing Manager/ Asst Brand Manager Overview:  As a Marketing Manager/Brand Manager, you will be responsible for developing and executing strategic marketing plans to build brand awareness, drive customer engagement, and ultimately increase sales. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure consistency in brand messaging across all channels and touchpoints. Key Responsibilities: Brand Strategy Development: Develop and implement comprehensive brand strategies that align with the company's overall objectives. Conduct market research to understand consumer insights, market trends, and competitor activities. Define the brand's unique value proposition and positioning in the market. Marketing Campaigns Management: Plan and execute integrated marketing campaigns across various channels, including digital, social media, print, and events. Collaborate with creative teams to develop compelling content, advertisements, and promotional materials. Monitor campaign performance and analyze key metrics to optimize effectiveness and ROI. Brand Identity and Visual Assets: Oversee the development and maintenance of brand identity guidelines, ensuring consistency in messaging, tone, and visual elements. Manage the creation of visual assets such as logos, packaging designs, and brand collaterals. Ensure adherence to brand guidelines in all marketing materials and communications. Market Analysis and Consumer Insights: Conduct market research and competitive analysis to identify market opportunities and threats. Gather and analyze consumer insights to inform marketing strategies and product development decisions. Stay updated on industry trends and emerging technologies to capitalize on new opportunities. Cross-functional Collaboration: Collaborate with internal teams such as product development, sales, and customer service to ensure alignment of marketing efforts with business goals. Work closely with external agencies, vendors, and partners to execute marketing initiatives effectively. Budget Management: Develop and manage marketing budgets, ensuring optimal allocation of resources for maximum impact. Track expenses and ROI for marketing activities, making adjustments as needed to achieve targets. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related field (Master's degree preferred). Proven experience in marketing or brand management, preferably in a similar industry or market. Strong understanding of branding principles, marketing strategies, and consumer behavior. Excellent communication, interpersonal, and leadership skills. Proficiency in market research, data analysis, and project management. Creative thinking and problem-solving abilities. Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and manage multiple projects simultaneously. Additional Requirements: Experience with digital marketing platforms and tools (e.g., Google Analytics, social media management software). Familiarity with graphic design software (e.g., Adobe Creative Suite) is a plus. Willingness to travel occasionally for events, conferences, or client meetings.

column2: DESIGNATION : -  Lead Trade Marketing  LOCATION : -  Agra  EXPERIENCE  :- 8-15 years Job Profile:-  The role of a trade marketing head is one that requires an extensive knowledge of the industry they work in. They are responsible for developing and executing marketing strategies that help their company sell its products or services to other businesses. They may be tasked with creating new sales opportunities, managing existing relationships with customers, or both. Their goal is to increase revenue by building strong relationships with key partners and clients. This role will work closely with the Sales, Marketing, and Finance teams to develop and execute trade marketing programs that support the companys overall sales and marketing objectives. The Trade Marketing Manager will also be responsible for managing the trade marketing budget and will be expected to provide regular reports on program effectiveness and ROI. ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:- Plan & execute trade marketing promotions/programs for the entire brand portfolio across channels/region. Prepare strategic pitch as per focused audience and build a calendar for each activity on the basis of building blocks. Execute as per plan by proper communication down the line and collaborate with the team and trade partners to conceptualize avenues of business. Prompt the target customer base to visit the outlet through offline (ATL, BTL) and online channels. Plan an annual calendar and execute ROI & data analysis to provide insights to the top management team. Develop, implement & execute marketing initiatives and activities for multiple brands including campaigns (print, web, social media, broadcast) events, corporate responsibility programs, and sponsorships SKILLS NEEDED:- Proven track record of developing and executing successful trade marketing programs. 7-10 years of experience in trade marketing, with at least 3 years in a management role. Strong analytical skills and experience using data to inform decision-making. Excellent project management skills. Outstanding communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills.

column2: Salesforce is seeking an experienced, well-rounded, dynamic and results-focused marketing professional to join the ASEAN marketing team as a Campaign Manager leading demand generation & integrated marketing programs for the agreed segment and/or buyer portfolio in ASEAN.          This role will drive marketing pipeline through a combination of Integrated Campaigns, Events, Digital Marketing, and Brand Awareness; connecting the customer journey with the appropriate mix of multi-cloud, cross-sell and up-sell programs across pipegen and pipe maturation; and aligning marketing across clouds, segments, and industries.              Previous roles working in technology companies and especially cloud and/or marketing to service, sales and/or marketing decision makers is an advantage.         This role requires an ability to work cross-functionally to deliver aggressive pipeline generation and lead growth.        The candidate needs excellent planning and organisational skills, as well as the ability to collaborate effectively and be accountable for results.        Analytical capability is also key for understanding and managing demand generation, forecasting, budgeting, lead flow, and the many moving parts involved in running an effective marketing machine.         This is a unique opportunity to work with and learn from a dynamic team of talented professionals that is recognised as one of the leading marketing organisations in the technology industry today.              The opportunity requires a dynamic, pragmatic and flexible marketing professional with experience coordinating integrated marketing programs. This position requires hands-on execution with the day-to-day coordination and program management of all aspects of the initiatives and campaigns.           Responsibilities:             Execute customer-driven, locally oriented end-to-end marketing strategies and programs to increase customer demand, positively impact Salesforce brand equity in Asia and meet pipeline goals throughout the funnel. Including lead generation activities, marketing campaigns, awareness building, product & solutions sales support, reference programs, customer & partner marketing, on-line marketing programs.             Collaborate with other marketing and communications specialists to deliver breakthrough ideas and innovation in our go-to-market strategy for net-new business via all relevant mediums and channels (eg Digital, events, 3rd party associations, influencers, PR/media, social media and sales programs).             Coordinate enablement of sales development and sales programs/telemarketing resources.             Improve and apply processes and best practices to ensure program success, making programs globally visible and available, measure outcomes and manage budgets to maximise impact.             Publish frequent campaign scorecards to share performance trends and best practices with key stakeholders and colleagues.             Collaborate with marketing stakeholders to gain input into the program strategy, campaign approach, creative direction and impact measurement (goals/performance). column2: Campaign Planning and Execution:      Develop and execute performance marketing campaigns across various digital      channels, including search engine marketing (SEM), social media      advertising, display advertising, and email marketing, to drive patient      acquisition and engagement. Audience Targeting: Utilize audience      segmentation and targeting strategies to reach specific patient segments      with personalized messaging and offers, maximizing campaign effectiveness      and ROI. Ad Creation and Optimization: Create      compelling ad copy, visuals, and landing pages that resonate with target      audiences and drive desired actions. Continuously optimize ad creative,      targeting, and bidding strategies to improve campaign performance. Budget Management: Manage digital      marketing budgets effectively, allocate resources strategically, and      optimize spending to achieve desired campaign objectives and ROI targets. Campaign Tracking and Analysis:      Implement tracking mechanisms and performance metrics to monitor campaign      performance, analyze key metrics such as impressions, clicks, conversions,      and return on ad spend (ROAS), and provide regular reports and insights to      stakeholders. Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO):      Identify opportunities to improve website and landing page conversion      rates through A/B testing, user experience optimization, and other CRO      techniques, maximizing the impact of digital marketing campaigns. SEO and Content Optimization:      Collaborate with the content team to optimize website content, metadata,      and structure for search engine optimization (SEO), improving organic      visibility and driving qualified traffic to the website. Remarketing and Retargeting:      Implement remarketing and retargeting strategies to re-engage website      visitors and previous patients with personalized messaging and offers,      increasing conversion rates and patient retention. Competitor Analysis: Conduct      competitive analysis and benchmarking to identify industry trends, best      practices, and opportunities for differentiation, informing campaign      strategies and tactics.   Bachelors degree in marketing,      Advertising, Business Administration, or related field. Proficiency in digital advertising      platforms such as Google Ads, Facebook Ads Manager, LinkedIn Ads, and      programmatic advertising platforms. Strong analytical skills and      experience with data analysis tools such as Google Analytics, Google Tag      Manager, and Excel. Experience with conversion rate      optimization (CRO) techniques and tools. Excellent communication,      presentation, and project management skills. Ability to multitask, prioritize      projects, and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment. Certification in Google Ads, Facebook      Blueprint, or other relevant digital marketing certifications is a plus.

column2: Salesforce is seeking an experienced, well-rounded, dynamic and results-focused marketing professional to join the ASEAN marketing team as a Campaign Manager leading demand generation & integrated marketing programs for the agreed segment and/or buyer portfolio in ASEAN. The candidate needs excellent planning and organisational skills, as well as the ability to collaborate effectively and be accountable for results.        Analytical capability is also key for understanding and managing demand generation, forecasting, budgeting, lead flow, and the many moving parts involved in running an effective marketing machine.         This is a unique opportunity to work with and learn from a dynamic team of talented professionals that is recognised as one of the leading marketing organisations in the technology industry today. This position requires hands-on execution with the day-to-day coordination and program management of all aspects of the initiatives and campaigns. column2: Influencer Marketing Associate Job Description: We are looking for a talented and enthusiastic Influencer Marketing Associate to join our dynamic team. As an Influencer Marketing Associate, you will play a pivotal role in developing and executing influencer marketing campaigns to promote our brand and products.  Responsibilities:  1. Identify and research potential influencers and content creators across various social media platforms who align with our brand values and target audience.  2. Build and maintain relationships with influencers, negotiate contracts, and manage partnerships to ensure successful collaborations.  3. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop creative and engaging influencer marketing campaigns that drive brand awareness, engagement, and sales.  4. Coordinate and oversee the execution of influencer campaigns, including content creation, posting schedules, and performance tracking.  5. Monitor and analyze the performance of influencer campaigns, providing regular reports and insights to optimize future strategies.  6. Assist in managing influencer budgets and tracking expenses to ensure campaigns are executed within budget constraints.  8. Act as a liaison between influencers and internal teams to facilitate communication and ensure all campaign requirements are met.  Requirements:  1. Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, Business, or a related field.  2. Proven experience in influencer marketing, influencer relations, or digital marketing.  3. Strong understanding of social media platforms, influencer marketing trends, and industry regulations.  4. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build and maintain relationships with influencers and internal stakeholders.  5. Creative thinker with the ability to develop innovative influencer marketing strategies and campaigns.  6. Analytical mindset with the ability to analyze data, measure campaign performance, and derive actionable insights.  7. Detail-oriented with strong organizational and project management skills.  8. Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment and manage multiple projects simultaneously.  9. Proficiency in influencer marketing platforms and tools is a plus.  If you are passionate about influencer marketing and eager to collaborate with influencers to amplify our brand's message, we'd love to hear from you! Join us in leveraging the power of influencer partnerships to drive brand growth and engagement. To apply, please submit your resume and a cover letter highlighting your experience in influencer marketing and any relevant campaign examples or success stories.

column2: Job Description: Marketing Automation Specialist Position Overview: We are seeking a talented and motivated Marketing Automation Specialist to join our dynamic marketing team. The Marketing Automation Specialist will play a critical role in designing, implementing, and optimizing marketing automation campaigns and workflows. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of marketing automation platforms, data analysis, and a passion for driving lead generation, customer engagement, and overall marketing efficiency. Key Responsibilities: Marketing Automation Campaigns: Create, deploy, and manage automated marketing campaigns using the marketing automation platform. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop campaign strategies, content, and assets. Build and optimize lead nurturing workflows to guide prospects through the customer journey. Data Management and Analysis: Segment and manage customer and prospect databases for targeted campaigns. Analyze campaign performance and engagement metrics to drive continuous improvement. Monitor and maintain data hygiene to ensure accuracy and compliance with data privacy regulations. Platform Management: Be the in-house expert on the marketing automation platform (e.g., Marketo, HubSpot, Pardot, etc.). Configure and troubleshoot automation workflows, email templates, landing pages, and forms. Implement best practices for data integration, synchronization, and lead scoring. Lead Generation and Nurturing: Develop and execute lead generation strategies that align with overall marketing goals. Design and optimize lead nurturing programs to increase conversion rates and sales readiness. Implement A/B testing to refine campaign elements and improve results. Collaboration and Communication: Work closely with content creators, designers, and digital marketing teams to align messaging and visuals. Collaborate with sales teams to ensure alignment on lead qualification criteria and lead handoff processes. Reporting and Insights: Generate regular reports on campaign performance, including key metrics and insights. Provide actionable recommendations based on data analysis to optimize campaign outcomes. Proficiency in using marketing automation platforms such as Marketo, HubSpot, Pardot, etc. Strong understanding of lead nurturing, segmentation, and customer journey mapping. Excellent communication skills and ability to collaborate across teams. Detail-oriented with strong project management skills. Ability to adapt to a fast-paced and changing environment. column2: Job Title: Sales Engineer - Substation Automation* *Overview:* As a Sales Engineer specializing in Substation Automation, you will be responsible for driving sales and revenue growth by promoting and selling our company's automation solutions tailored for substations. Your role will involve understanding client needs, designing customized automation solutions, and effectively communicating the value proposition to prospective clients. This position requires technical expertise in substation automation systems and strong sales acumen to effectively engage with clients and stakeholders. *Key Responsibilities:* 1. *Client Engagement:* Identify and engage with potential clients in the utility and energy sectors to understand their automation requirements and challenges. 2. *Solution Design:* Collaborate with engineering teams to design and customize substation automation solutions based on client specifications and industry standards. 3. *Product Demonstration:* Conduct product demonstrations and presentations to showcase the features, functionalities, and benefits of our automation solutions to clients. 4. *Proposal Development:* Prepare comprehensive proposals, including technical specifications, cost estimates, and implementation timelines, tailored to meet the needs of individual clients. 5. *Relationship Management:* Build and maintain strong relationships with key decision-makers and influencers within client organizations to facilitate successful sales and long-term partnerships. 6. *Market Analysis:* Stay updated on industry trends, competitor activities, and market developments related to substation automation to identify new business opportunities and competitive advantages. 7. *Sales Strategy:* Develop and implement effective sales strategies and tactics to achieve sales targets and expand market share in the substation automation sector. 8. *Customer Support:* Provide ongoing support and assistance to clients throughout the sales process, from initial inquiry to post-sales support, ensuring high levels of customer satisfaction. 9. *Training and Education:* Conduct training sessions and workshops for clients to educate them on the use and maintenance of substation automation systems, as well as new product developments. *Qualifications:* - Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, or related field.  - Proven experience in technical sales, preferably in the field of substation automation or power systems. - Strong understanding of substation automation principles, including SCADA systems, RTUs, communication protocols, and intelligent electronic devices (IEDs). - Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to articulate complex technical concepts to non-technical audiences. - Demonstrated ability to build and maintain client relationships, negotiate contracts, and close sales. - Highly motivated self-starter with a results-oriented mindset and the ability to work independently as well as part of a team. - Willingness to travel as needed to meet with clients and attend industry events and conferences. *Benefits:* - Competitive salary with performance-based incentives. - Comprehensive benefits package including health insurance, retirement plans, and vacation/holiday pay. - Opportunities for professional development and advancement within the company. - Dynamic and collaborative work environment with a focus on innovation and creativity. *Join our team and play a key role in shaping the future of substation automation technology!*
column11: Sales Engineering, Industrial Sales, Industrial Automation, Technical Sales, Automation Sales

column2: We are seeking an experienced and results-driven Account-Based Marketing (ABM) Specialist with a strong background in the software development services industry      The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of developing and executing successful ABM strategies to drive engagement, generate leads, and support revenue growth      The ABM Specialist will collaborate closely with sales and marketing teams to create targeted campaigns that resonate with key accounts          Responsibilities                ABM Strategy Development:                    Develop and execute comprehensive account-based marketing strategies aligned with overall business goals. Campaign Planning and Execution:                    Create and implement targeted marketing campaigns that resonate with key decision-makers in the software development services industry.            Utilize a multi-channel approach, including email, social media, content marketing, and events, to engage and nurture target accounts.                Content Development:                    Collaborate with content creators to develop personalized and compelling content tailored to specific accounts. Data Analysis and Reporting:                        Track and analyze the performance of ABM campaigns, providing regular reports on key metrics such as engagement, conversion rates, and pipeline impact. Cross-Functional Collaboration:                      Work closely with sales teams to understand their goals, gather feedback, and adjust ABM strategies accordingly.            Collaborate with other marketing teams to integrate ABM initiatives into broader marketing programs.                Technology Utilization:                    Utilize marketing automation and CRM tools to streamline ABM processes and ensure accurate tracking of campaign performance.            Stay updated on industry trends and tools to enhance ABM capabilities.                Budget Management:                    Manage the budget for ABM initiatives, ensuring cost-effective campaigns that deliver measurable results.                  Requirements                Experience: Minimum of 4 years of experience in account-based marketing, preferably within the software development services industry.              Education: Bachelors degree in marketing, business, or a related field. Technology Proficiency: Familiarity with marketing automation tools, CRM systems, and other relevant marketing technologies.              Industry Knowledge: A deep understanding of the software development services industry and its unique challenges and opportunities. column2: Role:   CRM Manager Department:  Digital Marketing Job location:  Ahmedabad Job Role Its a multidisciplinary role where the Ecommerce CRM Manager also plays an important role in the continuous optimization of the customer journey. Ecommerce CRM Manager is responsible for ensuring that online sales and conversion opportunities are always maximized across the websites through analysis and insight to drive the business forward. The role is focused primary on emails - transactional, newsletters, automations. This is a key role in the company, ensuring all digital activities (viz. digital marketing and promotional activity) and supporting processes are followed and delivered appropriately.  Role & responsibilities   Lead the Ecommerce CRM roadmap, planning, ensuring all sales targets are met. Work towards EBITDA to achieve business KPI. Manage and develop CRM team, creating a sales and retention  culture. Define promotional calendar for global markets, with primary  focus is on US and UK ensuring alignment with teams and stakeholders. Management and grow in-house CRM system assuming ownership. Technical development of CRM campaigns in all different      lifecycle's conversion, retention, and reactivation Management of all customer retention channels - monitoring campaign roll-out and execution/performance. Responsible for customer retention and increasing Customer Lifetime Value. Develop retention strategies including but not  limited to CRM, Email, SMS, Push, Customer Segmentation and Marketing      Automation Well-versed with data analysis and drawing insights on campaign performance,  while using data to optimize strategy. Help define the CRM roadmap to achieve retention      goals. Ensure communications are  aligned with the promotions and releases roadmap.  Provide analysed  & measurable performance reports weekly / monthly / periodically explaining performance vs plan. Reporting on key  web metrics such as email-MoM and YoY & major KPIs such as open rate,   CTR, conversions, unsubscribes. Work closely with the Sr. Management to drive the performance of  the websites and all related KPIs including revenue, orders, conversion,      AOV and returns rates. Work with finance team to define the forecasts and the promotional calendar, phase sales target by week ahead of the new season. Working in alignment with  Merchandising Team for the new product announcements & plan CRM  activities accordingly. Report and analyse promotional performance and redemptions of   new/existing customers. Proactively share analysis and recommendations of sales  performance with the team and provide opportunities and actions. Provide   guidance to the team and drive commercially through VM, pricing, product    recommendations and content. Preferred candidate profile     Must have 5+ Years of strong  hands-on experience with Ecommerce sales and      CRM portfolio. Must have prior experience of driving and scaling Retention/Engagement with using      CRM. Must have deep understanding of global Ecommerce market, especially UK / US. Prior Print-On-Demand experience is a plus. Experience with Lifestyle, Home Decor, Customized or Artistic products. Must have experience of working with any CRM software, including automation. Must be well versed with Designing, Tracking and Analytics systems. Strong sense of design to create and execute campaigns with  minimal external help. Strong commercial acumen & highly organised with excellent  attention to detail. Strong verbal and written communication skills at all levels Strong team player, able to work flexibly to support the team  where required. column2: We are seeking someone who loves social media, writing, ads, mailers, content promotion, and more to bring our marketing strategies to the next level.         As Marketing Executive, youll report to Marketing Manager and help us increase our global marketing footprint.         You'll partner closely with Product Marketing, Content, Sales, and Brand Design on optimizing a variety of content buckets, and whatever the next content trend is for our social, mailing, and digital advertisement channels.          Additionally, you will assist with various marketing initiatives to grow the business. Also, you should be able to churn out reports and metrics with the help of sophisticated marketing tools and present to the team.         As a member of the Marketing Team, you will use your expert-level knowledge in digital advertising - campaign optimization, programmatic SEO, mailers, ad buying, and more.             Responsibilities               Perform excellent data analysis and optimize the delivery of running campaigns.             Create weekly reports, ad hoc reports, and final reports with audience insights, performance insights, and brand insights that are meaningful for clients. Analyze key marketing metrics, especially ads and social media analytics.             Manage ad platforms (Google and/or LinkedIn etc)             Plan and Launch digital advertisements to increase brand awareness             Expert in programmatic SEO             Expert in tracking pixels, mobile measurement partners, and third-party measurement             Daily content creation across Twitter, LinkedIn, YouTube, and Facebook. Project manage multiple social media distribution requests, align expectations and prioritize editorial calendar.             Daily management and optimization of campaigns to ensure success metrics are achieved. As well as identify potential issues and communicate recommendations for improvement.             Requirements               3+ years experience in social media. Experience growing Twitter, Facebook, & Linkedin communities.             2+ years experience in ad-ops of setting up campaigns / troubleshooting / optimizing (Google and/or LinkedIn etc) Experience with Google Ads Platform, Google Analytics, LinkedIn, and Facebook Ads would be highly preferred.             Strong copywriting skills. Good programmatic setup and troubleshooting knowledge.             A strong collaborative and cooperative mindset that can work with cross-functional teams.             A team player, a quick thinker with leadership abilities, and a fast learner to pick up the industry nuances.           Perks         Hybrid work (including our yearly retreats to exotic locations)         Apple Stack(MBP, FCP)         Flexible work schedule         Highly competitive compensation         And much more

column2: Job Description As a Digital Marketing and Content Executive at AAF International, you will play a key role in shaping our brand's digital presence and driving our marketing efforts to new heights. Your multifaceted expertise will encompass a wide range of responsibilities, including content creation, social media management, website optimization, data analysis, public relations, corporate communications, and more. You will work collaboratively with cross-functional teams to implement comprehensive marketing strategies that align with our brand's growth objectives . Key Responsibilities: 1. End to End Content Management: Create a comprehensive content calendar, including blog posts, articles, social media updates, and email newsletters. Research industry trends and competitors to develop content that positions AAF International as a thought leader. Collaborate with subject matter experts to gather information and insights for content creation. Edit and proofread content to ensure accuracy, consistency, and alignment with brand guidelines. Monitor content performance using analytics tools and adjust content strategies accordingly. 2. Guiding Design Teams for Required Designs: Work closely with the design team to provide creative briefs for marketing materials. Review and provide feedback on design concepts to ensure they effectively convey the brand's message. Ensure that all visual content, including graphics and 3D designs, aligns with the overall branding and marketing objectives. 3. Dealer & Distributor Communications: Establish and maintain regular communication with dealers and distributors to understand their needs and challenges. Develop marketing materials and support programs tailored to the requirements of dealers and distributors. Provide training and resources to help dealers and distributors effectively promote AAF International's products. 4. End to End Website Management: Oversee the planning and execution of website updates, including new product launches, feature enhancements, and content additions. Collaborate with web developers to ensure the website is user-friendly, responsive, and optimized for search engines. Implement SEO strategies to improve website visibility and search engine rankings. 5. Agency and Associations (Registration and Billing): Manage the onboarding and contractual processes with marketing agencies and industry associations. Monitor budget allocations and expenditures related to agency partnerships and association memberships. Ensure that all contractual obligations and deliverables are met by external partners. 6. Lead Generation (from Generating to Database): Develop and execute lead generation strategies using digital marketing channels, including SEO, SEM, email marketing, and social media advertising. Implement lead scoring and tracking mechanisms to prioritize and qualify leads. Maintain a CRM database, segment leads, and provide sales teams with qualified leads for follow-up. 7. Driving Digital Campaigns (Organic and Inorganic): Develop detailed campaign plans, including target audience analysis, budget allocation, and performance benchmarks. Execute and optimize digital marketing campaigns across various platforms, such as Google Ads, social media, and email marketing. Monitor ad spend, click-through rates, conversion rates, and ROI to optimize campaign performance. 8. Monthly Marketing Reporting: Generate comprehensive monthly marketing reports that include key performance indicators (KPIs) for all digital marketing activities. Analyze data to identify trends, successes, and areas for improvement. Present findings and recommendations to the leadership team and use insights to refine marketing strategies.
column11: Excellent Verbal And Written Communication Skills, marketing and branding, Creative Thinking, Digital Marketing, Content Writing

column2: 1)Budget for the role - 4.8 lpa 2)Detailed JD? (mandatory)- Job Title: Business Development Executive - Category Overview: As a Business Development Executive, you will play a crucial role in driving the growth and success of our Category. Your primary responsibility will be to identify new business opportunities, build relationships with potential sellers, and facilitate the expansion of our seller base. You will work closely with the sales category and central teams to develop strategies for acquiring new customers and increasing revenue. The ideal candidate is a motivated and results-oriented individual with excellent communication and negotiation skills. Should have to manage internal stakeholder and internal processes efficiently. Key Responsibilities: Seller Relationship Management: Building and maintaining strong relationships with existing sellers to ensure seller satisfaction and retention. Understanding sellers' needs and requirements and providing tailored solutions to meet their objectives. Acting as the main point of contact for sellers and addressing any inquiries or concerns promptly. Sales Strategy and Development: Implementing effective sales strategies to achieve revenue targets and business objectives. Collaborating with the Category team to create compelling sales pitches and presentations for prospective sellers. Monitoring market trends and competitor activities to identify new opportunities and stay ahead of industry developments. Pipeline Management: Managing the sales pipeline and tracking progress against targets. Forecasting sales projections and reporting on key performance metrics to category regularly. Market Research and Analysis: Conducting market research to identify emerging trends, customer needs, and competitive offerings. Analyzing data and metrics to evaluate the effectiveness of sales and marketing initiatives and identify areas for improvement. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Sales, or related field (Master's degree preferred). Proven track record of success in business development, category, or account management roles. Strong understanding of sales principles, techniques, and processes. Excellent communication, presentation, and negotiation skills. Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment. Proficiency in CRM software and Microsoft Office suite. Microsoft Excel Proficiency is a must. Willingness to travel as needed. Preferred Attributes: Strategic thinker with a proactive and results-driven mindset. Ability to build rapport and establish trust with clients and colleagues. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Adaptability and willingness to learn new skills and technologies. Entrepreneurial spirit and passion for driving business growth. 3)Contract Duration - 01 year 4)Shift timings(if applicable) - na 5)Is WFH available? - No 6)Work location (full address)? -??Flipkart Internet Pvt Ltd. ?Block C, Embassy Tech Village, Outer Ring Road, Devarabeesanahalli Village, Bengaluru, Pin Code: 560103   Role & responsibilities   Preferred candidate profile   Perks and benefits

This is in reference to your CV uploaded on naukri.com  We are exporters of Pharmaceutical Raw materials based in  Ghatkopar, Mumbai There is an opening for International Marketing / Business Development Executive - Females ONLY for  APIs  The JD as below: - Maintaining STRONG Relationship with Existing customers. - Finding new customers online. - Updating clients with new products. - Sending prices, samples and other documents by email to customers - Writing down quotations in the inquiry book - Following up with clients for orders, maintaining records and payments accordingly. - Coordination with the Purchase department and follow up of shipments. - Coordination with logistic department for freight - Negotiating Prices, payment terms for getting Order till execution - Retaining the existing customers and the potential customers through various online application like Skype, etc - Targeting clients with specific products in case of stocks. - Having track on exhibitions held for the whole year. - Contacting exhibitors of each exhibition with the company's updated product list. - Maintaining records of each exhibitions & contacting exhibitors on monthly basis - Arranging meeting schedules with International clients. - Contacting visited clients with issues discussed & following up on regular basis for requirements Minimum experience - 3 years in  Pharma Export Marketing If you are looking for a change, please let us have your updated CV for the same on hr@aarambhlifescience.com or WhatsApp on 90822 34914 Also, if any of your colleagues or friends are looking to take new opportunities, please do let us know. Looking forward to your valuable reply.

column2: Greetings! & very warm welcome to BEST-FIT Recruitment Riders, We are BEST-FIT Recruitment Riders feel immense pleasure to search and provide you with better carrier opportunities to aid you in achieving your aspirations. BEST-FIT Recruitment Rider is a  highly specialized Recruitment & Executive Search Partner for Pharmaceutical, Biotech, CRO, Chemicals, Medical Devices & Turnkey Pharma Projects Engineering-Construction Design Sectors.  We are searching & recruiting highly qualified professionals for Middle-Senior-Upper-Management and Executive jobs.  (Eg: Managers, VP, President, CFO & CEO).   Also offering customized recruitment services by Headhunting & Executive Search for Middle & Top management level professionals according to clients specific needs. We are BEST-FIT Recruitment Riders do exactly what our name tells.  To know more about us please visit our website: www.bestfitrecruitment.co.in We would like to inform you that presently we have  professional career opportunity  matching to your profile with one of our esteemed client. Please see the following position summary: Client Name: Well-integrated Pharma Company Position:    Executive / Sr. Executive -    International Marketing  Markets: MENA, LATAM, CIS, Russia   Products: APIs & Bulk Drugs   Department: Marketing Reporting to: Head Marketing / CMD  Location: Powai, Mumbai Job Profile: Responsible for looking after International Marketing activities for APIs & Bulk Drugs. Grow the International business by developing strategies, using current and new global contacts to expand and increase sales opportunities. Generate new customer database of pharmaceutical industry and start communication with new customers.  Define & execute business strategies for the international business.  Business Analysis & Development - Diligently access business operations to determine sustainability, competitive positioning and revenue opportunities.  Review Old Business which has been discontinued and Develop new Business internationally. Making long term contracts with international companies for the products for APIs also New product development as per customer demand. Conduct market mapping, generating enquiries and checking costing and pricing as per technical requirement. Present monthly, quarterly review for the product and market and identify / execute opportunities to optimize commercially. Regularly communicate with existing customer and supplier.  Achieving targeted market share of the product. Conduct market mapping, generating enquiries and checking costing and pricing as per technical requirement. To conclude the business deals with domestic clients and take quick action for commercialization. Technical documentation, Tender Order. Technical & Commercial details on inquiries. Desired Profile: Candidate should have  Graduate / MBA / MMS / PGDBA(Marketing / Business)  with  5 to 8 yrs in International Marketing  professional looking for a fast paced, performance oriented growth. Must have exposure of MENA, CIS, Russia & LATAM countries.  Must have strong chemistry base background with marketing skill. Ability to develop and maintain short to long-term strategic forecasts and plans to increase efficiency and profit. Fluent in English and strong coordinating skills.  Should have excellent Written Communication Skills in English.  Should have hands on focus on customer centricity.  Should have high on Negotiation skills. Should have High on Integrity, high on Assertiveness, Proactive in Nature and Result Oriented. Must have good communication skill and willingness. Must have good knowledge of computer with strong command over MS Office.    Company Profile: Company is a manufacturing API, Bulk Drugs, Advanced Intermediates & Specialty Fine Chemicals, Intermediates & Vitamin D meeting the needs of national as well as international customers with continuous development. Company is a well-integrated pharma company established in 1980 & having its marketing office at Mumbai & manufacturing plant at Badlpaur, Tarapur (Boisar) & Ambernath near Mumbai, MH. Company has its API manufacturing with State of Art WHO cGMP Plant. Company is a preferred API Manufacturing company with State - of - Art Facility, having 2 streams of production line with WHO GMP Certification. Company's facility is Japanese FDA approved having EU Written Confirmation and audited by Top Indian and International companies. Company has dedicated API facility with WHO-GMP certification & PMDA (Japanese FDA) approval. Company is a one of the largest producer of PTS Acid, PTS Amide & Chloramine T in India. & registered 5 USDMF, 1 Japanese DMF, 1 Taiwanese DMF & 2 EDMF. Company has 5 multi-purpose plants to produce multi-step advanced intermediates. Company has also constructed & established newly fully automated biotech manufacturing facility recently for production of Enzymes at Ambernath, Mumbai.    Recruiter's Contact Details: BEST-FIT Recruitment Riders G-7, Amrit Complex, R.V. Desai Road,  Vadodara-390001, Gujarat Mobile: 09722042906, 09722052906  E-Mail: post@bfrr.in Website: www.bestfitrecruitment.co.in

column2: We are looking for a resilient, empathic Marketing Executive to contribute to the growth of our company. You are responsible for finding and retaining clients, encouraging extant clients to purchase added products or features, and remaining abreast of changes in consumption. You should attend networking events to attract and retain clientele. Ultimately, an outstanding marketing executive will keep a close eye on clients' feedback to ensure that our products and services always exceed expectations. Responsibilities: Familiarizing yourself with all products and services offered by our company. Procuring new clients through direct contact, word-of-mouth, and collaboration with the marketing department. Attending networking activities to research and connect with prospective clients. Maintaining meaningful relationships with existing clients to ensure that they are retained. Suggesting upgrades or added products and services that may be of interest to clients. Crafting business proposals and contracts to draw in more revenue from clients. Reviewing clients' feedback and implementing necessary changes. Remaining in tune with trends in consumption to ensure that our offerings remain relevant. Requirements: Degree in marketing, business administration, or similar. Intuitive and insightful, particularly regarding human behaviour. Professional yet affable disposition. Great networking skills. Excellent written and verbal communication. Resourceful, with outstanding research skills. Emboldened by challenges

Maintain a tracking system for monthly budget vs. expenses, generating insightful dashboards and reports for management review. Desired Skills  :-    1. Communication skills in both Hindi and English, showcasing the ability to expertly translate and tailor content. 2. Proficient in modifying content in Hindi and English  (Mandatory) 3. Proactive and self-driven attitude, displaying initiative and adept problem-solving skills independently.

Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, dynamic environment, managing multiple priorities and deadlines with attention to detail. Team player with strong interpersonal skills, able to collaborate cross-functionally and build relationships at all levels of the organization. column2: sales Executive - Steel Pipes and TMT (Thermo-Mechanically Treated) Bars Job Summary: As a Sales Executive for Steel Pipes and TMT Bars, your primary responsibility is to drive sales of these products by identifying potential customers, understanding their needs, and offering suitable solutions. You will be responsible for building and maintaining strong relationships with clients, negotiating contracts, and achieving sales targets. This role requires excellent communication skills, industry knowledge, and a customer-focused approach to sales. Key Responsibilities: Market Analysis: Conduct market research to identify potential customers, market trends, and competitive activities in the steel pipes and TMT bars segment. Gather information on customer requirements, preferences, and purchasing behavior to tailor sales strategies accordingly. Customer Acquisition: Identify and approach potential customers, including construction companies, contractors, infrastructure projects, and manufacturing units, to generate new business opportunities. Develop and maintain a database of leads and prospects, and actively pursue sales opportunities through cold calling, networking, and referrals. Relationship Management: Build and nurture relationships with existing and new customers to understand their business needs and provide appropriate product solutions. Act as a trusted advisor to clients, offering technical expertise, product recommendations, and after-sales support to ensure customer satisfaction. Sales Negotiation and Closure: Prepare and present sales proposals, quotations, and contracts to prospective clients, highlighting the features, benefits, and competitive advantages of the company's steel pipes and TMT bars. Negotiate terms and conditions of sale, including pricing, payment terms, and delivery schedules, to secure profitable deals and maximize revenue. Sales Target Achievement: Set ambitious sales targets and develop action plans to achieve or exceed sales goals for steel pipes and TMT bars. Monitor sales performance, track progress against targets, and take proactive measures to address any deviations or challenges. Market Expansion: Explore opportunities to expand market reach and penetration by identifying new market segments, geographic regions, or customer segments for steel pipes and TMT bars. Develop and implement sales strategies and promotional activities to increase brand awareness and market share. Sales Reporting and Analysis: Maintain accurate records of sales activities, customer interactions, and sales transactions using CRM software or sales tracking tools. Prepare regular sales reports, forecasts, and analysis for management review, highlighting key metrics, trends, and opportunities for improvement. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Engineering, or related field. Primary,Secondary, Channel Distribution Sales Experience is Mandatory. Proven experience in sales or business development, preferably in the steel industry or construction sector. Sound knowledge of steel pipes, TMT bars, construction materials, and related products. Strong negotiation, communication, and interpersonal skills. Results-driven mindset with a track record of achieving sales targets and driving business growth. Familiarity with CRM software, Microsoft Office suite, and sales analytics tools. Valid driver's license and willingness to travel as needed. Working Conditions: Primarily office-based role with frequent visits to client sites, construction projects, or industry events. Flexible working hours may be required to accommodate customer meetings and business requirements. Potential for occasional travel within the assigned sales territory or region. Intrested candidate Drop your cv to  sethuraman.s@cielhr.com Contact Hr-  9047098030

Qualification: MBA   Experience: 2+ Years   Gender: Male   /   Female   Job Description  We are looking for a dynamic Senior Digital Marketing Professional who's passionate in building SEO strategies company  -  wide. An ideal role for someone who has excellent problem  -  solving skills with a proven track record of creating and executing company's SEO strategies designed to improve rankings and drive revenue. You will be responsible for managing the global market for Celexsa Technologies.     Be the in  -  house Digital Marketing expert and evangelize best practices  ,   responding to issues and queries as they arise across marketing. Clearly define SEO requirements and recommend site enhancements designed to increase average ranking and drive traffic  ,   trials and revenue. Maximize organic traffic growth by establishing robust target keyword list and work closely with marketing colleagues across all channels  ,   including content  ,   email  ,   web  ,   PR and social.     Optimize website architecture  ,   URL structures  ,   category taxonomies and content. Be an expert on the ins and outs of our website  ,   ensuring sitemaps stay updated . Work on the content on link building efforts  ,   including strategy and processes. Stay abreast of new developments in the eCommerce and SEO space  ,   developing proactive strategies to help us become best  -  in  -  class in both domestic and international search. Manage SEO tech stack and be accountable for all business performance metrics related to SEO  ,   reporting weekly KPI metrics and project status . Develop and manage social media strategies digital marketing campaigns. Write and optimize content for the website and social networking accounts. Knowledge of IT industry along with Content Marketing  ,   E  -  commerce  ,   Digital and Mobile marketing  ,  sending bulk SMS  ,   interacting in Whatsapp and Facebook groups will be an added advantage. Track and analyse website traffic flow and provide regular internal reports. Attain KPIs such as reducing the website bounce rate  ,   increasing dwell time . Continually work on the Search Engine Optimization (SEO) for all websites. Edit and post videos  ,   podcasts and audio content and fix any errors on company's online website. Create online banner adverts and oversee pay per click (PPC) ad management. Contribute content for email marketing campaigns. Identify new trends in digital marketing  ,   evaluate new technologies and ensure the brand is at forefront of industry developments . Contribute content for email marketing campaigns. Editing and writing skills: You need to devise and edit content for various digital platforms. Have eye for details whilst writing blog posts may well be an integral part of the job. Communication is a key aspect  ,   you will guide and explain coherently to Clients  ,   who may not be familiar with the digital medium. Attend campaign briefings. Demonstrate a thorough understanding of our clients products and services and the objectives of specific campaigns. Maintain confidentiality. column1: Lead, Specialist Solution Engineer - Financial Services/Automotive
column2: We are thrilled to offer an exceptional opportunity for a visionary Presales professional to join our team, focused on revolutionizing the Financial Services/Automotive vertical     This role presents an exciting chance to collaborate with a rapidly expanding and dynamic industry, showcasing the innovative capabilities of Salesforce applications and platforms     We are seeking a candidate who is not only proficient in Presales but is also deeply passionate about driving impactful change and fostering continuous learning and personal growth     The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of partnering with Financial Services/Automotive organisations to drive tangible business outcomes through cutting-edge technology solutions     They should possess a keen ability to engage with both business and technology leaders at the highest levels, effectively communicating the transformative power of Salesforce     More than just presenting features, we are looking for someone who can passionately articulate the profound business value that comes from embracing change and leveraging Salesforce as a strategic partner in this journey towards digital transformation     If you are an innovative thinker who is enthusiastic about your work, dedicated to ongoing learning, and driven by the prospect of personal and professional growth, we encourage you to apply         Typical Day of a Solution Engineer:           Strategic Partner: Collaborate closely with Sales teams to navigate territories, fostering productive relationships with prospects and existing customers.         Insightful Discovery: Lead outcome-driven conversations to deeply understand and define customer business requirements during discovery calls.         Visionary Solutions: Co-create future visions for customers on the Salesforce platform, aligning short and long-term goals to drive digital transformation.         Dynamic Demonstrations: Bring visions to life through compelling product demonstrations, showcasing the versatility and potential of our platform.         Continuous Growth: Engage in ongoing training and certification programs to expand and maintain expertise, staying ahead of industry trends.         Feedback Champion: Act as a liaison between product and enablement teams, offering valuable field insights to drive solution evolution and enhancement.         Trusted Advisor: Share expert perspectives on the business value provided by our solutions, building confidence and trust with potential customers.           Specific Responsibilities:           Provide thought leadership in how large enterprise organisation can drive customer success through digital transformation.         Ability to uncover the challenges and issues a business is facing by running successful and targeted discovery sessions and workshops.         Be an innovator who can build new solutions using out-of-the-box thinking.         Engage with business users to build solution presentations, demonstrations and prototypes.         Build roadmaps that clearly articulate how partners can implement and accept solutions to move from current to future state.         The ability to authoritatively present and articulate the business value to managers and executives of all levels.         Deliver functional and technical responses to RFPs/RFIs.         Work as an excellent teammate by chipping in, learning and sharing new knowledge.         Demonstrate a conceptual knowledge of how to integrate cloud applications to existing business applications and technology.         Lead multiple customer engagements concurrently.         Be self-motivated, flexible, and take initiative.           Required Skills:           Degree or equivalent relevant experience required. Experience will be evaluated based on the core proficiencies or the role (eg extracurricular leadership roles, military experience, volunteer roles, work experience, etc)         A minimum of 7+ yrs of relevant experience in the IT Industry, either pre-sales or implementation of customer engagement solutions, supporting the sales cycle in selling CRM or high value business solutions.         Relevant Industry Experience into Financial Services/Automotive vertical         Strong focus and experience in pre-sales or implementation is required.         Experience in demonstrating Customer engagement solution, understand and drive use cases, customer journeys, ability to draw Day in life of across different LOBs.         Business Analysis/ Business case/return on investment construction.         Experience in sophisticated solution selling to Enterprise customers         A broad understanding of and ability to articulate the benefits of Cloud Computing, SFA, Service Support, Marketing and Mobile solutions.         Strong verbal and written communications skills with a focus on needs analysis, positioning, business justification, and closing techniques.         Outstanding presentation and demonstration skills
column11: Cloud computing, Business analysis, Business solutions, Customer engagement, Business case, digital transformation, Financial services, Automotive, CRM, Salesforce
