column1: Lead Specialist Solution Engineer - Financial Services / Automotive
column2: We are thrilled to offer an exceptional opportunity for a visionary Presales professional to join our team, focused on revolutionizing the Financial Services/Automotive vertical     This role presents an exciting chance to collaborate with a rapidly expanding and dynamic industry, showcasing the innovative capabilities of Salesforce applications and platforms     We are seeking a candidate who is not only proficient in Presales but is also deeply passionate about driving impactful change and fostering continuous learning and personal growth     The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of partnering with Financial Services/Automotive organisations to drive tangible business outcomes through cutting-edge technology solutions     They should possess a keen ability to engage with both business and technology leaders at the highest levels, effectively communicating the transformative power of Salesforce     More than just presenting features, we are looking for someone who can passionately articulate the profound business value that comes from embracing change and leveraging Salesforce as a strategic partner in this journey towards digital transformation.     If you are an innovative thinker who is enthusiastic about your work, dedicated to ongoing learning, and driven by the prospect of personal and professional growth, we encourage you to apply.         Typical Day of a Solution Engineer:           Strategic Partner: Collaborate closely with Sales teams to navigate territories, fostering productive relationships with prospects and existing customers.         Insightful Discovery: Lead outcome-driven conversations to deeply understand and define customer business requirements during discovery calls.         Visionary Solutions: Co-create future visions for customers on the Salesforce platform, aligning short and long-term goals to drive digital transformation.         Dynamic Demonstrations: Bring visions to life through compelling product demonstrations, showcasing the versatility and potential of our platform.         Continuous Growth: Engage in ongoing training and certification programs to expand and maintain expertise, staying ahead of industry trends.         Feedback Champion: Act as a liaison between product and enablement teams, offering valuable field insights to drive solution evolution and enhancement.         Trusted Advisor: Share expert perspectives on the business value provided by our solutions, building confidence and trust with potential customers.           Specific Responsibilities:           Provide thought leadership in how large enterprise organisation can drive customer success through digital transformation.         Ability to uncover the challenges and issues a business is facing by running successful and targeted discovery sessions and workshops.         Be an innovator who can build new solutions using out-of-the-box thinking.         Engage with business users to build solution presentations, demonstrations and prototypes.         Build roadmaps that clearly articulate how partners can implement and accept solutions to move from current to future state.         The ability to authoritatively present and articulate the business value to managers and executives of all levels.         Deliver functional and technical responses to RFPs/RFIs.         Work as an excellent teammate by chipping in, learning and sharing new knowledge.         Demonstrate a conceptual knowledge of how to integrate cloud applications to existing business applications and technology.         Lead multiple customer engagements concurrently.         Be self-motivated, flexible, and take initiative.           Required Skills:           Degree or equivalent relevant experience required. Experience will be evaluated based on the core proficiencies or the role (eg extracurricular leadership roles, military experience, volunteer roles, work experience, etc)         A minimum of 7+ yrs of relevant experience in the IT Industry, either pre-sales or implementation of customer engagement solutions, supporting the sales cycle in selling CRM or high value business solutions.         Relevant Industry Experience into Financial Services/Automotive vertical         Strong focus and experience in pre-sales or implementation is required.         Experience in demonstrating Customer engagement solution, understand and drive use cases, customer journeys, ability to draw Day in life of across different LOBs.         Business Analysis/ Business case/return on investment construction.         Experience in sophisticated solution selling to Enterprise customers         A broad understanding of and ability to articulate the benefits of Cloud Computing, SFA, Service Support, Marketing and Mobile solutions.         Strong verbal and written communications skills with a focus on needs analysis, positioning, business justification, and closing techniques.         Outstanding presentation and demonstration skills
column11: Cloud computing, Business analysis, Business solutions, Customer engagement, Business case, digital transformation, Financial services, Automotive, CRM, Salesforce

step up when you see a need..           OWNERSHIP:    Pick up the ball. Be proactive, take responsibility and follow-through.           INNOVATION:    Elevate to win. Be curious, test and learn new and better ways of doing things.           TEAMPLAY:    Win together. Work collaboratively and cultivate a shared mindset.           INTEGRITY:    Play by the rules. Hold yourself and others accountable to our company's standards.           RESPECT:    Value all players. Display empathy, be inclusive and show dignity to all

column2: Job Responsibilities: Amazon Growth: Minimum 2 years of hands-on experience executing and scaling Amazon Ads campaigns, demonstrating a deep understanding of Amazon's advertising platform. Utilize strong analytical skills to interpret campaign data, identify trends, and make data-driven decisions to optimize performance and achieve business objectives. Develop and implement innovative strategies to enhance sales performance and increase market competitiveness on Amazon. Take ownership of all operational aspects of our Amazon business, including inventory management (FBA), pricing strategies, and promotional activities, to maximize sales and profitability. Manage and optimize advertising spend, oversee the lifecycle of ASINs, and monitor the P&L of Amazon operations to meet financial targets. Continuously assess market demand and execute processes to introduce new ASINs or products effectively, ensuring a diverse and competitive product portfolio. Regularly analyse key performance metrics such as BSR, customer reviews, ratings, revenue, and inventory levels to identify opportunities for improvement and address any issues proactively. Amazon Growth: Minimum 2 years of hands-on experience executing and scaling Amazon Ads campaigns, demonstrating a deep understanding of Amazon's advertising platform. Utilize strong analytical skills to interpret campaign data, identify trends, and make data-driven decisions to optimize performance and achieve business objectives. Develop and implement innovative strategies to enhance sales performance and increase market competitiveness on Amazon. Take ownership of all operational aspects of our Amazon business, including inventory management (FBA), pricing strategies, and promotional activities, to maximize sales and profitability. Manage and optimize advertising spend, oversee the lifecycle of ASINs, and monitor the P&L of Amazon operations to meet financial targets. Continuously assess market demand and execute processes to introduce new ASINs or products effectively, ensuring a diverse and competitive product portfolio. Regularly analyse key performance metrics such as BSR, customer reviews, ratings, revenue, and inventory levels to identify opportunities for improvement and address any issues proactively. Retention Marketing: Execute and manage retention marketing channels to drive revenue growth through various channels such as WhatsApp, SMS, email, push notifications, referral / loyalty programs, and affiliates. Ideate & Execute strategies for the entire retention marketing funnel. Plan and execute event-specific campaigns to enhance customer retention. Analyse the customer experience and decision-making process at each stage of the customer journey. Analyse competitive, customer, and industry trends to develop innovative approaches for market launches. Define strategies and manage the communications charter through CRM channels to drive user journeys across different life cycles. Manage the end-to-end user lifecycle through various engagement and retention strategies to reduce funnel drop-offs. Establish and implement best practices for cohort creation, database marketing, measurement, evaluation, data capture, maintenance, and customer/prospect list selection. Must have a decent understanding of retention marketing tools like Webengage, Klaviyo, CleverTap, Engati etc. Skills: - A Team Player with a pro-active and a go-getter attitude - Coming up with pragmatic solutions with respect to the task at hand - Demonstrable leadership skills - Strong proficiency in data analysis tools and platforms, with the ability to derive actionable insights from complex datasets. - Excellent strategic thinking and problem-solving skills, with a track record of driving tangible business results. - Command over MS Office applications (such as Excel, Word, and Powerpoint) - Excellent Verbal and Written English communication skills - An eye for detail is a must - Proactive at problem solving
column11: ECommerce marketing, Amazon Marketing, Online Marketing, advertising, Marketing Retention

column2: Role & responsibilities  :  Identify and prioritize key physicians, medical practices, and healthcare facilities within the assigned region for targeted outreach and relationship-building   Develop and implement a strategic sales plan to effectively engage with doctors and healthcare professionals, including scheduling meetings, presentations, and networking events   Build and maintain strong professional relationships with physicians, medical staff, and key decision-makers to understand their needs, preferences, and patient referral patterns   Educate healthcare providers about our hospital's services, specialties, capabilities, and unique value proposition to generate interest and referrals   Provide timely and accurate information to healthcare professionals regarding patient admissions, discharge procedures, and follow-up care to facilitate seamless referral processes   Collaborate with internal departments, including marketing, physician relations, and patient services, to coordinate referral activities, resolve issues, and optimize patient care coordination   Track and analyze referral data, sales performance metrics, and market trends to identify opportunities for growth, expansion, and improvement   Stay informed about industry developments, competitor activities, and emerging trends in healthcare to maintain a competitive edge and capitalize on market opportunities  Preferred candidate profile  : Any Graduate with an MBA in Marketing or Hospital Management is a must Minimum 1 year to 6 years of experience in Hospital Sales (Referral Sales or VC relations, Doctors Relations) is a must Candidate must have Bangalore Regional experience in the hospital. Must have good connects with the doctors.   Proven track record of achieving sales targets, generating leads, and cultivating relationships with key stakeholders   Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build rapport and credibility with healthcare professionals   Strong organizational skills, attention to detail, and ability to manage multiple priorities in a fast-paced environment   Proficiency in using CRM software, Microsoft Office suite, and other sales tools for tracking activities, managing contacts, and analyzing data   Must have 2 wheeler with a Valid driver's license and willingness to travel extensively within the assigned region to meet with doctors and healthcare facilities   Commitment to upholding ethical standards, patient confidentiality, and compliance with regulatory requirements  Perks and benefits
column11: Referral Sales, Doctors Relations, Market Access, Doctor Activities, empaneling doctors, Referral Marketing, Hospital Sales, Hospital Marketing

column2: Candidates must have strong proven leadership in research, teaching and PhD supervision.          Should have demonstrated potential to publish in high ranking Scopus-indexed journals (and/or ABDC A*/A/B ranked) journals and commitment to high-quality scholarly teaching.          Candidates must have strong proven leadership in research, and PhD supervision.          Strongly encourage candidates with specialisation in the areas of Marketing, Business/data Analytics; Also preferences given to those with experience in teaching or research in Sustainability Management and Entrepreneurship.          Candidates ought to also have demonstrated ability to build effective networks with faculty, students, and industry leaders and other stakeholders, and foster interdisciplinary initiatives.          The resume should have details of the educational qualifications, contact details, details of work experience, research grants, research projects, interest areas for both teaching and research, research publications - claerly identifying if journal is Scopus indexed, Scimago ranking (Q1;Q2, etc);      ABDC ranking also desirable; and three references with one international referee.      Also provide the scopus id and google scholar id if available.

column1: Associate / Senior Associate - Academic Outreach & Marketing
column2: The Associate / Senior Associate - Academic Outreach & Marketing will be responsible for all the operational activities involved in the outreach and marketing process for IIHS s growing portfolio of academic programmes      The incumbent will be responsible for implementing outreach activities for the academic programmes and ensuring that the applications target for all courses are met, in terms of both numbers and quality of students, while adhering to all relevant regulations and policies      S/he will collaborate with members from other Functions and Programmes in IIHS to ensure that the outreach process is efficient and effective, and also reach out to various academic institutions and organizations to promote IIHS and attract qualified applicants                The role requires excellent communication, market orientation and networking skills.                    Activities and Tasks        Responsibilities would include, but not be limited to, the following:        Executing outreach and marketing plans to ensure that potential students are aware of IIHS academic programmes and consider them as genuine and preferred career options;      Adhering to systems and processes to gather and analyse applications data on an ongoing basis;      Collaborating with the Communications and Design team, other relevant teams in IIHS, and with external vendors and service providers to develop and deploy marketing material;      Working closely with the Academics & Research team and the different IIHS Schools to ensure that application standards align with the Institution s academic goals;      Ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements in all operational activities and initiatives related to academic outreach and marketing;      Maintaining relationships with other educational institutions and ecosystem partners;      Providing support to other IIHS activities including academics, research, training, practice, operations and others;      Participating in all activities of Institution-Building at IIHS; carrying out tasks as assigned by IIHS; and travelling on IIHS work within the country as and when needed.              Structure and Reporting        The Associate/ Senior Associate - Academic Outreach & Marketing will report to the Lead - Academic Outreach & Marketing or to any other senior member overseeing academic outreach and marketing at IIHS, and will be required to collaborate effectively with a diverse group of internal teams and external individuals/organizations, and students.            Person Specification        The ideal candidate should have:        A Bachelor s degree in Management, Human Resources, Urban Planning, Law, Humanities / Social Sciences, Human Development, or other relevant discipline;      Total experience of at least 5 years, out of which at least 2 should be in marketing & outreach (in a higher education institution);      A proven track record of implementing marketing & outreach strategies;      Experience in data reporting and analysis;      Ability to work in matrix structures;      Excellent communication and interpersonal skills;      An ability to develop and maintain relationships with key stakeholders, both internal and external.
column11: Interpersonal skills, Matrix, Networking, Urban planning, data reporting, SSI, Healthcare, HR, Research, Operations

column2: Role & responsibilities   Amazon Account Management : Manage and optimize Amazon seller accounts, including product listings, pricing, and inventory management. Amazon Marketing Services (AMS) : Develop and execute advertising campaigns using Amazon Marketing Services (AMS), including Sponsored Products, Sponsored Brands, and Sponsored Display ads. Monitor and analyze campaign performance, optimize ad spend, and adjust strategies to maximize ROI. A+ Content Creation : Create engaging A+ content (Enhanced Brand Content for vendors and A+ Enhanced Marketing Content for sellers) to enhance product detail pages and improve conversion rates. Storefront Management : Create and manage Amazon storefronts to showcase products and promote brand identity. Data Analysis and Reporting : Analyze sales data, advertising metrics, and other performance indicators to identify trends, opportunities, and areas for improvement. Generate reports and provide insights to stakeholders to inform decision-making and strategy development. Company Introduction: Founded in 1992, CeX is a leading UK based retail chain having operations in multiple territories across the globe with a strong foothold in the domain for over 2 decades. An understanding of the internet and experience in using E-commerce and content management tools. Experience in working on product catalogs, categories, and attributes is a plus. Key Responsibilities   Developing ideas and pinpointing business problems   Understanding the needs and wants of the clients and consumers by through market research   Drive the strategic direction of each campaign and ensuring the fit of the creative work with the brand strategically   Running qualitative research groups; using a variety of market research data to monitor cultural and social trends and their impact on consumers attitudes,  behaviors and perceptions   Gaining a comprehensive context for advertising strategies by analyzing a wide range of information in great detail,  including demographics,  socio- economics and the market for the client s product and market share   Providing the creative team with a clearly defined brief that contains concise information on the product,  audience and strategy so that they can develop creative ideas applicable to the media channels that will promote the idea most effectively.   Develop innovative ways to reach consumers   Analysing and interpreting a variety of information   Commissioning external qualitative and quantitative research   Keeping up- to- date with cultural/ social trends and customers views and attitudes   Undertaking qualitative research activities   Making presentations to clients and agency staff   Evaluating campaign effectiveness   Analysing sales data   Post Graduate,  Graduate or holder of UGC approved Diploma in Mass Media /  Marketing Communication /  Advertising or equivalent   Certification in Digital Media /  SEO /  SEM /  Ecommerce/ Strategy or Planning will be added honors   2.5 6 years of work experience with a brand,  digital/ social/ advertising/ creative/ media agency   Skills   Behavioural   Eagerness to learn and explore various facets of the job with an enthusiasm to share learning with others   An enthusiast and fanatic of new- age digital advertising   Expresses clearly and an active listener to constructive feedback and instructions   Must be able to perform and be collaborative under pressure situations and tight deadlines   Must be adept to working in a dynamic team structure   Willingness to undertake a variety of work not limited to the role/ job specifications with an ongoing commitment to achieving highquality results   Technical   Comprehensive knowledge of Social & Digital Media,  Online Marketing,  Publishing platforms and abreast with latest industry trends,  model,  communication concepts,  practices,  tools,  etc.   Dynamic written communication,  presentation and oration skills; strong hold on language   Should have a constant and relevant presence in the social spaces   Innate balanced analytical and strategic thinking ability   A business and brand thinker,  understanding the relationship between media and business outcomes   Strong understanding of the changing role of digital media in brand development   Highly organized to be able to handle multiple deadline driven projects and workflows   Able to train,  manage and guide a team of highly skilled individuals   Ability to effectively communicate company brand values via social media

column2: Understand the Construction Industry: Leverage your Civil engineering background to understand the specific needs and challenges of the construction industry. This knowledge will help you tailor your marketing and sales approach to address the pain points of potential clients. Product Knowledge: Gain in-depth knowledge of the construction ERP products you are selling. Understand how they can streamline processes, improve efficiency, and provide value to construction companies. Build a Strong Online Presence: Develop a professional online presence through platforms like LinkedIn. Showcase your expertise in both civil engineering and marketing. Connect with professionals in the construction industry and share relevant content to establish yourself as an industry thought leader. Networking: Attend industry events, conferences, and trade shows related to construction and technology. Network with professionals in the field, build relationships and stay updated on industry trends. Collaborate with Industry Influencers: Identify and collaborate with influencers or key figures in the construction industry. Their endorsement can enhance the credibility of the ERP products you're marketing. Create Targeted Marketing Materials: Develop marketing materials that highlight the specific benefits of the ERP products for construction companies. Tailor youre messaging to resonate with your audience's needs and showcase real-world use cases. Demonstrations: Provide live demonstrations of the ERP products to potential clients. Showcase how the software can address their pain points and improve their workflows. A hands-on experience can be very persuasive. Customer Testimonials: Collect and showcase testimonials from satisfied clients who have successfully implemented the construction ERP products. Positive feedback from industry peers can build trust. Continuous Learning: Stay updated on the latest trends and advancements in both the construction and technology sectors. Continuous learning will enable you to adapt your marketing and sales strategies to changing market dynamics. Collaborate with Teams: Work closely with marketing & sales teams to understand customer needs and feedback. This collaboration will help in refining marketing strategies and addressing any challenges faced during the sales process.

column2: Role & responsibilities   We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced individual to join our team as a Business Development professional in the field of Civil Engineering. As a key member of our organization, you will be responsible for driving growth and development activities to expand our client base and further establish our presence in the industry. This is an excellent opportunity to utilize your exceptional business acumen, sales skills, and industry knowledge to make a significant impact on our company's success.   Responsibilities Proactively identify and pursue new business opportunities in the Civil Engineering industry Develop and implement strategic plans to generate leads, build relationships, and close deals Conduct market research to identify potential clients and trends in the industry Collaborate with internal teams to create and deliver compelling proposals and presentations Manage the entire sales process from lead generation to contract negotiations Build and maintain strong relationships with key decision-makers and industry influencers Track and analyze sales data to identify areas for improvement and maximize sales performance Requirements Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field Proven track record of success in business development and sales Extensive knowledge of the Civil Engineering industry and current market trends Strong negotiation and closing skills Excellent communication and presentation skills, both written and verbal Ability to work independently and as part of a team Proficiency in Microsoft Office suite and CRM software

column1: Urgent Opening | Performance Marketing Specialist | Education Company
column2: Job Description:   JOB TITLE: Performance Marketing Assistant/ Executive LOCATION: Noida ROLE PURPOSE: We are seeking a skilled and results-oriented Performance Marketing Assistant to join our study abroad higher education company. As a Performance Specialist, you will play a critical role in creating & executing strategic paid search campaigns to promote our educational programs, drive student enrolment, and enhance our brand visibility. Your expertise in digital advertising and data analysis will contribute to the success of our digital marketing initiatives. This is an exciting opportunity to make a significant impact on our student recruitment efforts and overall business growth. ROLE and RESPONSIBILITIES: 1. Create and execute comprehensive Digital Marketing campaigns across various advertising platforms, including Google Ads, Bing Ads, Facebook Ads and LinkedIn Ads. that effectively target prospective students, promote university & their programs, and drive quality leads. Conduct market research, competitor analysis, and audience segmentation to identify opportunities and refine targeting strategies. 2. Conduct keyword research and ad copywriting: Perform in-depth keyword research to identify relevant and high-converting keywords for our target audience. Develop compelling ad copy that aligns with our brand voice, highlights our unique value proposition, and encourages user engagement and conversions. 3. Monitor and analyse campaign performance: Regularly monitor campaign metrics, including click-through rates (CTR), conversion rates, cost per acquisition (CPA), and return on ad spend (ROAS). Utilize analytics tools to gather insights and make data-driven decisions to optimize campaigns, improve performance, and increase student enrolment. 4. Implement landing page optimization strategies: Collaborate with the marketing and web development teams to create and enhance landing pages that align with PPC campaigns. Implement best practices for landing page design, user experience, and conversion rate optimization to improve lead quality and conversion rates. 5. Stay updated on industry trends and best practices: Continuously stay abreast of industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in paid ads and higher education marketing. Leverage this knowledge to propose innovative strategies and drive ongoing improvements to our PPC campaigns. 6. Setting up & leading the team for campaign management, email marketing, marketing automation, SEO, affiliate marketing, remarketing. 7. Proficiency in essential marketing tools including Google Analytics, SEMrush, keyword planner, SEO tools, CRM software, email marketing tools, data visualization tools, CMS platforms, marketing automation tools, social media management tools, and A/B testing tools. Essential Skills and Experience Bachelor's degree in marketing, advertising, or a related field (preferred) Proven experience as a Performance Paid campaign Assistant/Executive or in a similar role, Experience with A/B testing and data-driven decision-making. Proficiency in Google Ads, Bing Ads, and social media advertising platforms Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and make informed decisions using analytics tools Excellent understanding of keyword research, ad copywriting, and campaign optimization techniques Familiarity with analytics tools such as Google Analytics and conversion tracking Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment. Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work cross-functionally with marketing and web development teams.
column11: Google Analytics, Ab Testing, Performance Paid Campaign, Google Ads, Bing Ads

column2: The Role Responsibilities: User Acquisition: Develop and execute strategies to acquire new users  for the Hogr app through various digital marketing channels, both  organic and paid.   ASO (App Store Optimization): Implement strategies to optimise app store  listings, including keyword optimisation, A/B testing, and staying  abreast of industry trends.  Campaign Management: Plan, execute, and monitor marketing campaigns to  promote app features, events, and user-generated content. Collaborate  with the creative team to develop compelling marketing materials.   Analytics and Reporting: Utilize analytics tools to track and analyse  user behaviour, campaign performance, and other key metrics. Provide  regular reports and insights to inform decision-making.   Retention and Engagement: Implement initiatives to enhance user  engagement, satisfaction, and retention. Utilise data-driven insights  and work with the product team.   Customer Feedback: Gather and analyse customer feedback to identify  opportunities for improvement and innovation. Work closely with the  product development team to enhance the user experience. Requirements:   At least 3 years of experience in app marketing, preferably in the food or social networking industry.   Strong understanding of mobile app ecosystems, user behaviour, and trends.   Proficiency in marketing analytics tools such as Google Analytics 4,  Firebase, Apple App Analytics, and AppTweak to drive data-driven  decision-making.   Excellent communication and collaboration skills.   Creative thinking and the ability to develop innovative marketing strategies.   Knowledge of ASO best practices and experience with app store optimisation.   Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field. Job Overview:   We seek a passionate and results-driven App Marketing Specialist to join  our dynamic team. As an App Marketing Specialist, you will be  key in shaping and executing our app marketing strategy, driving user  acquisition, engagement, and retention.

column2: A Day in the Life of an Marketing Executive  As a Junior Brand Strategist at Pangolin Marketing, your day will be dynamic and strategic, involving collaboration, critical thinking, and innovative problem-solving. Heres a glimpse into a typical day: Morning Routine: Start the day by checking emails, attending a team stand-up meeting, and setting priorities. Market Research and Analysis: Conduct and analyse market research to gather data on industry trends and consumer behaviour. Persona Development: Work with senior brand consultants to create detailed customer personas based on research findings. Customer Journey Mapping: Assist in developing comprehensive customer journey maps, identifying key touchpoints for engagement. Content Marketing Strategy: Collaborate on planning and creating strategic content that aligns with branding efforts. Strategy Development: Participate in strategy meetings, presenting research findings and contributing to strategic decisions. Collaborative Innovation: Engage in brainstorming sessions and team collaborations to develop innovative branding concepts. Reporting and Documentation: Prepare reports and document insights, strategies, and recommendations for ongoing and future projects. Key Responsibilities Strategic Support: Collaborate with senior brand consultants to develop comprehensive and data-driven branding strategies. Persona Development: Conduct thorough research and analysis to create accurate and detailed customer personas that inform targeted marketing efforts. Customer Journey Mapping: Assist in creating detailed customer journey maps that outline every stage of the customer experience, identifying key touchpoints and opportunities for engagement. Market Analysis: Utilise critical thinking to analyse market trends, competitor strategies, and consumer behaviour, providing actionable insights for branding initiatives. Content Marketing: Support in developing and contributing to strategic content marketing initiatives that align with overall branding strategies, ensuring content effectively engages target personas and supports the customer journey. Innovative Thinking: Contribute to brainstorming sessions and the development of innovative branding concepts that align with client objectives. Research and Insights: Conduct extensive market research to support branding strategies and provide insightful recommendations. Skills and Qualifications Advanced Skills Strong analytical and critical thinking abilities. Proficiency in market research and data analysis tools. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Strategic Skills Ability to think strategically and contribute to high-level branding decisions. Strong understanding of branding principles and methodologies. Creative problem-solving skills with a focus on innovation. Collaborative Skills Reselinet and Driven Proven ability to work effectively in a team environment. Strong interpersonal skills to facilitate collaboration and idea sharing. Flexibility and adaptability in a dynamic work environment. Requirements MBA in Marketing or a related field. Demonstrated high IQ and strong problem-solving capabilities. Proven track record of strategic thinking and critical analysis in a professional or academic setting. Passion for branding and a commitment to using data-driven approaches to achieve marketing excellence.

column1: Global Marketing Executive at Sabar Hydrotech For Water Pumps & Pipes
column2: Global Marketing Executive at Sabar Hydrotech Join the team at Sabar Hydrotech , a prominent export-oriented unit of the Sabar Group, a brand celebrated for its innovation and excellence since 1975. Sabar Group has a rich legacy in engineering and manufacturing high-quality submersible pumps and motors, pivotal in industries across the globe. With business operations spanning over 40 countries, Sabar Hydrotech has been exporting it's products from india to the world since the 1980s. Our export team, honoured 23 times with awards from the Government of India, is looking for a motivated  Export Marketing Executive  to contribute to our growth, based in Vatva GIDC, Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India. In this role, you will be responsible for expanding our international market presence by managing complete sales cycles, enhancing relationships with B2B clients, and coordinating with our planning and shipping departments. Based in Vatva GIDC, Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India, and when required travel for international exhibitions and international marketing initiatives. Ability to understand our technical products is essential, so a background in Mechanical or Electrical Engineering is preferable. The ideal candidate must possess good communication skills in English, both written and verbal, to interact effectively and professionally with our international clients. We seek an energetic, proactive individual with a go-getter attitude, well-suited for the dynamic world of international marketing. Key Responsibilities: Maintain and enhance relationships with existing B2B clients, ensuring continuous collaboration and satisfaction. Manage complete sales cycles, including follow-ups on orders and closing deals. Communicate effectively in English through emails and negotiations. Coordinate with internal planning and shipping departments to ensure order deliveries. Travel with the team as required for international exhibitions and international marketing initiatives. Engage with potential customers online, helping to extend our international market presence. Preferred Qualifications: Bachelors degree, diploma, or equivalent experience in Electrical/Mechanical Engineering. 2-3 years of experience in marketing industrial products or ability to learn quickly. Able to communicate verbally and via email with clients in English. We Offer: Required training on export markets and our product range, conducted by our award-winning team. Opportunities for professional growth within a diverse, multicultural setting. A supportive work environment dedicated to nurturing and caring for our employees. Application Instructions:  Interested candidates are encouraged to send their updated resumes to  careers@sabarpumps.com . For more information about our company and to explore our product offerings, please visit  www.sabarpumps.com . Embrace a world of opportunities at Sabar Hydrotech, leveraging the legacy and expertise of the Sabar Group, recognized by the Government of India for our excellence in exports!

column2: Internship Duration:  8 - 9 Months?  The team you would join You would join the Asia Marketing Team (though looking after a global portfolio as Global e-commerce is managed from Asia), headed by Asia Marketing Lead. We are a team of brand managers, digital marketers, trade marketers. This team uses their expertise to navigate complex and ever-evolving market scenarios to develop marketing-led innovations to power access to brighter lives. The team works on building the brand across areas that we have a presence in. Few examples of our work include rural marketing, POSM innovation, In-Store branding, GTM strategy for new product launches, Product packaging, Market Research, thought leadership positioning, e-commerce etc. About the role: The Ecommerce Marketing Intern at Sun King will be responsible for global e-commerce sales management, including platforms in the USA, Kenya, Nigeria, Uganda, Myanmar, and India (additional markets may be added in the future). We are looking for an enterprising, self-motivated person who is excited about the opportunity to work on building a high-impact, socially focused brand. An understanding of and passion for e-commerce would be a plus. A go-getter who is a fast learner and takes ownership and accountability would be a great fit. You would be joining a lean Global E-Commerce team that manages sales in Africa and Asia. Reporting would be to Digital Marketing Manager - E Commerce (Global) What you will be expected to do: Follow-ups with e-commerce Platform POCs for discussions initiated by Global e-Commerce Manager Ideate, create, and float creative briefs for e-commerce content to the design team. Ensure the approved content is then uploaded to the platforms. Collate content for all products on Official Drive (easy to share for listings on newly acquired platforms) Timely tweaks in content and strategies on all platforms. Maintain healthy and cordial relationships with Platforms POCs across platforms. Keep timely track of and report on Free + Paid-for visibilities on platforms (excluding CPC campaigns that we run daily on the platforms) Generate weekly/monthly/quarterly/half-yearly/annual reports for review and decision-making on all Global e-commerce platforms. Daily Checks on  Inventory: Ensure at least 2 weeks inventory are available for BAU days and 1 month for event days Sales: daily recording of sales and raising the flag if required. Prices: Daily check on prices on the platform to ensure products are sold at correct price B2B Lead Generation Portals: Call Audits, CC Agent Management and Feedback, Trade India Lead purchasing and pass on to CC Team, reporting. Qualifications: Possessing one year of experience or currently pursuing a degree/diploma in e-commerce Marketing. Demonstrate organizational skills, meticulous attention to detail, a process-oriented mindset, and a proficiency with numbers. Exhibit proactive and self-motivated qualities. Possess robust project management abilities, capable of handling multiple projects concurrently. Display proficiency in MS Word, Excel, and PowerPoint. Good Communication to coordinate with teams across the globe. Can work with minimal supervision

column2: Candidates relevant to this experience, kindly mail your resume at shivani.salian@gmail.com Job   Overview The Account Based Marketing Manager is responsible for the strategy and implementation of effective Account Based Marketing programs that meet the growth objectives of the business, with a strong emphasis on driving pipeline generation exclusively from a top target account list and accelerating existing opportunities. He/She will partner with the strategic accounts sales team to drive sales pipeline and revenue through account-targeted programs and will own the overall responsibility for planning and executing a multitude of marketing programs in strategic accounts. The role will also support strong partnership with the sales teams and with key stakeholders within the Marketing organization.   Responsibilities and Duties Define Account Based Marketing strategy and execution planning, encompassing the required ABM tools for assigned strategic accounts Own and manage our Account Based Marketing plans for assigned strategic accounts Partner with Sales Leaders and Client Partners to develop regional, account focused playbooks including, but not limited to, nurture, channel activities, live/online events with the goal of building and accelerating the pipeline. Collaborate and partner with core marketing functions on campaign concept, custom content requirements, digital marketing support and creative development to ensure effectiveness for regional named accounts. Identify the most effective marketing messages, value proposition, materials, channels, and calls to action for key accounts Build/manage ABM metrics to ensure business impact measured by named account  Manage project timelines, quality issues, resources, & budgets Assist with account research and campaign planning, development and execution   Experience Overall 10+ years experience with 3 plus years of proven multi-channel marketing and Account Based Marketing with large multinationals/IT firms Having worked with BFSI clients will be an added advantage Specific Skills CRM/marketing automation background like Salesforce and Marketo,  Understanding of pipeline management and metrics. Demonstrated experience overseeing various marketing program executions

column2: We are seeking an experienced and results-driven Account-Based Marketing (ABM) Specialist with a strong background in the software development services industry      The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of developing and executing successful ABM strategies to drive engagement, generate leads, and support revenue growth      The ABM Specialist will collaborate closely with sales and marketing teams to create targeted campaigns that resonate with key accounts          Responsibilities                ABM Strategy Development:                    Develop and execute comprehensive account-based marketing strategies aligned with overall business goals.            Identify and prioritize target accounts based on strategic criteria and collaborate with sales teams to ensure alignment.                Campaign Planning and Execution:                    Create and implement targeted marketing campaigns that resonate with key decision-makers in the software development services industry.            Utilize a multi-channel approach, including email, social media, content marketing, and events, to engage and nurture target accounts.                Content Development:                    Collaborate with content creators to develop personalized and compelling content tailored to specific accounts.            Ensure content aligns with the buyers journey and addresses the unique challenges and pain points of the software development services industry.                Data Analysis and Reporting:                        Track and analyze the performance of ABM campaigns, providing regular reports on key metrics such as engagement, conversion rates, and pipeline impact.                Use data insights to optimize continually and improve ABM strategies.                  Cross-Functional Collaboration:                      Work closely with sales teams to understand their goals, gather feedback, and adjust ABM strategies accordingly.            Collaborate with other marketing teams to integrate ABM initiatives into broader marketing programs.                Technology Utilization:                    Utilize marketing automation and CRM tools to streamline ABM processes and ensure accurate tracking of campaign performance.            Stay updated on industry trends and tools to enhance ABM capabilities.                Budget Management:                    Manage the budget for ABM initiatives, ensuring cost-effective campaigns that deliver measurable results.                  Requirements                Experience: Minimum of 4 years of experience in account-based marketing, preferably within the software development services industry.              Education: Bachelors degree in marketing, business, or a related field.              Strategic Thinker: Ability to think strategically and develop targeted campaigns that align with business objectives.              Communication Skills: Excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to create compelling and personalized content.              Analytical Skills: Strong analytical and data-driven decision-making skills to assess campaign performance and optimize strategies.              Collaboration: Proven ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, particularly with sales teams.              Technology Proficiency: Familiarity with marketing automation tools, CRM systems, and other relevant marketing technologies.              Industry Knowledge: A deep understanding of the software development services industry and its unique challenges and opportunities.              Adaptability: Ability to adapt to a dynamic and fast-paced environment, staying current with industry trends and best practices.

column2: We are looking for an experienced product marketing professional who will work within the Product Marketing Team, and plan and execute the go-to-market strategy for all products and services.      This role requires a passionate, collaborative, and solution-oriented approach and provides the opportunity to work with some of the biggest brands in the region in industries such as retail, hospitality, healthcare, travel, financial services, and real estate, to name a few.     Key roles and responsibilities for this position are as follows:        Lead & own the go-to-market strategy for all products & services in the company and execute new product launches.      Create and execute portfolio and product positioning that is compelling, competitive and relevant across the customer lifecycle during their launch as well as in the product life cycle. column2: Renascence Global invites applicants for the post of marketing officers for all the business operations. We look forward to creating a team of young, pleasing, and dynamic officers with deep market insights to complete the assigned nationwide targets.     ?       Usually, a marketing officer will:         Plan, prepare, and manage the publication and distribution of publicity materials.     Devise marketing campaigns     Organise a calendar of marketing events, such as dinners, promotions, exhibitions, product launches, workshops, open days, or fundraising activities     Represent the company at events     Undertake market research and establish the best way to reach target groups     Write, edit and proofread marketing material for use in different channels     Oversee and update the website(s)     Develop and communicate through the organization s CRM (Customer Relationship Management) system     Coordinate with outside agencies, for example, designers, to produce marketing material such as stationery and web pages     Line manage a marketing assistant or coordinator     Analyse the impact of marketing campaigns and prepare measurement reports     Write press releases and communicate with the media         Key skills         Writing skills: Among the key skills a marketing officer needs to have is the ability to write copy. The medium will be varied - the web, email, brochures, newsletters, press releases - but all require engaging copy for them to successfully convey marketing messages.     Management and delegation skills: Often as a marketing officer you will have to manage others in the marketing team and delegate work to them.     Networking and communication skills: You will have to represent your company at events and be comfortable talking to potential customers, opinion formers, and suppliers.         Benefits         Competitive salary: Marketing officers earn relatively high salaries. You can earn bonuses, commissions, and profit-sharing incentives based on the profits of the companies.     Transferable job skills: Marketing officers also learn valuable transferable job skills which they can use in future positions. These skills can help you to progress on to director and vice president positions in the future.     Varied work: Marketing officers get to work on a wider variety of activities from copywriting and PR to running campaigns and events.     Networking opportunities: You would have the opportunity to interact with different departments within the organization, allowing you to build connections and a solid reputation.         Relevant experience         The role of a marketing officer is not an entry-level role and some experience in a marketing or communications department will be expected.      Experience in the sector you aim to work in - education, finance or the theatre, for example, can be a great help.      The very least that will be expected is an experience in a customer-focused role.
column11: Web technologies, Networking, Marketing campaigns, Vice President, Market research, Management, Event marketing, CRM, Business operations

column2: The Sales Executive for Primary, Secondary, Channel, and Project Sales of Steels, TMT, and Steel Pipes is responsible for generating sales across multiple channels and project segments. This role involves identifying potential customers, developing strong relationships, understanding customer needs, and providing tailored product solutions. The ideal candidate will have a strong sales background, excellent communication skills, and in-depth knowledge of the steel industry. Key Responsibilities: Primary Sales: Identify and target primary market customers, including large construction companies, infrastructure projects, and government contracts. Develop and implement sales strategies to achieve primary sales targets. Conduct market research to identify new opportunities and stay updated on industry trends. Secondary Sales: Focus on secondary market customers, such as small to medium-sized construction firms and local contractors. Build and maintain strong relationships with secondary market customers. Provide product information and technical support to assist customers in their purchasing decisions. Channel Sales: Develop and manage relationships with distributors and dealers to drive channel sales. Implement channel sales strategies and promotional activities to boost sales through distribution partners. Conduct regular visits to distributor and dealer locations to monitor performance and provide support. Project Sales: Identify and pursue project sales opportunities in the construction, infrastructure, and manufacturing sectors. Work closely with project managers, engineers, and procurement teams to understand project requirements and provide suitable product solutions. Prepare and deliver compelling sales presentations and proposals for project tenders. Customer Relationship Management: Build and maintain strong relationships with existing and prospective customers across all sales channels. Conduct regular follow-ups to ensure customer satisfaction and address any issues or concerns. Provide exceptional customer service and support throughout the sales process. Negotiation and Closing Sales: Negotiate pricing, terms, and conditions with customers to close sales deals. Prepare and submit accurate sales quotations, proposals, and contracts. Ensure timely follow-up on sales inquiries and finalize sales transactions. Market Analysis and Reporting: Monitor market trends, competitor activities, and customer feedback to identify opportunities for growth. Prepare and submit regular sales reports, including sales performance, forecasts, and market insights. Provide feedback to management on market trends, customer preferences, and product requirements. Collaboration and Coordination: Coordinate with the production, logistics, and customer service teams to ensure timely delivery of products. Collaborate with the marketing team to develop promotional materials and campaigns to drive sales. Participate in trade shows, exhibitions, and industry events to promote products and network with potential customers. Compliance and Documentation: Ensure compliance with company policies, industry regulations, and safety standards. Maintain accurate records of sales activities, customer interactions, and transactions. Handle administrative tasks related to sales, including order processing, invoicing, and follow-up. Qualifications: Bachelors degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Engineering, or a related field. Proven experience as a Sales Executive or in a similar sales role within the steel industry. Strong knowledge of steel products, including TMT bars and steel pipes, and their applications. Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills. Ability to build and maintain strong customer relationships. Proficiency in using CRM software and Microsoft Office applications. Strong organizational and time management abilities. Self-motivated, results-oriented, and able to work independently. Willingness to travel frequently to meet customers and attend industry events. Working Conditions: Primarily based in an office environment, with frequent travel to customer sites, trade shows, and industry events. Regular interaction with customers, production teams, logistics, and other stakeholders. Standard working hours, with flexibility to work additional hours to meet sales targets and customer needs. Physical demands include traveling, standing during presentations, and occasionally lifting promotional materials. The role of the Sales Executive for Primary, Secondary, Channel, and Project Sales of Steels, TMT, and Steel Pipes is crucial in driving sales growth and expanding the customer base. This position requires strong sales acumen, excellent relationship-building skills, and a thorough understanding of the steel industry and its various sales channels. To contact HR 9047098030 Drop you cv to sethuraman.s@cielhr.com
column11: Project Sales, Secondary Sales, Distribution Channel Sales, Primary Sales, Distributor Handling

column2: Role & responsibilities: Strategic Planning & Execution: Conduct in-depth market research and competitor analysis to identify trends, opportunities, and potential threats within the assigned region. Develop a comprehensive BTL  marketing strategy aligned with the overall company objectives and regional needs. Set clear and measurable goals for BTL campaigns, outlining key performance indicators (KPIs) like store footfalls, new customer acquisition to track success. BTL Campaign Development & Management: Conceptualize and execute innovative BTL activities tailored to the regional audience. This could include experiential events, society activation programs , strategic partnerships, sponsorships, and pin code based marketing tactics. Oversee the logistics and execution of BTL activations, ensuring smooth operation and adherence to brand guidelines. Manage and negotiate with vendors and agencies for BTL activations, prioritizing         cost-effectiveness and timely deliverables. Catchment Area Marketing: Develop and implement targeted marketing campaigns specifically designed to capture the attention of  customers within the designated catchment area. Utilize a diverse marketing mix encompassing local print media, radio advertising, hyper-local digital marketing tactics, and strategic out-of-home placements in coordination with media team. Collaborate with the central catchment marketing team to develop compelling marketing materials that resonate with the local audience and effectively communicate brand         messaging. Performance Measurement & Optimization: Continuously monitor and analyse the performance of BTL campaigns and catchment area marketing initiatives. Leverage marketing analytics tools to generate insightful reports that track key metrics like footfall conversion rates, brand awareness lift, and overall campaign ROI. Utilize data-driven insights to optimize ongoing campaigns and refine future marketing strategies for maximum impact. Relationship Building &        Collaboration: Foster strong relationships with local media outlets, community organizations, and key         influencers to secure valuable promotional opportunities and brand mentions. Collaborate effectively with store managers within the region to ensure seamless program execution and clear communication across all levels. Provide ongoing support and guidance to store personnel regarding BTL activities and catchment area marketing initiatives. Preferred candidate profile:    Masters degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field, with a focus on marketing  Minimum of 4 years of experience in BTL marketing and/or retail marketing, with a proven track record of success in developing and implementing measurable BTL campaigns. Demonstrated understanding of local market dynamics, consumer behavior trends, and cultural nuances within the assigned region. Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills with the ability to influence and motivate stakeholders. Strong project management skills with the ability to manage multiple priorities, delegate tasks effectively, and meet deadlines under pressure. Budget management and negotiation expertise to secure cost-effective vendor partnerships. Proficiency in MS Office Suite, marketing analytics tools, and project management software. A passion for the retail industry and a strong belief in the power of BTL marketing to drive business growth. Should be proficient in local language.

column2: Role & responsibilities   Tele-caller, you will be responsible for making outbound calls to existing and potential customers with the goal of generating leads, selling products or services, or gathering information. You will represent the company professionally over the phone and provide excellent customer service while achieving performance targets. This role requires effective communication skills, persistence, and a customer-focused approach. Responsibilities: Make outbound calls to prospective and existing customers based on provided lists, leads, or databases. Introduce company products or services to customers and explain their features, benefits, and pricing. Engage in active listening to understand customer needs and preferences. Provide accurate information about products or services and answer customer inquiries. Persuade customers to purchase products or services or schedule appointments, as per campaign objectives. Follow predefined scripts and sales processes while adapting communication style to individual customer interactions. Collect and record customer information, including contact details, preferences, and feedback, in the CRM system. Meet or exceed daily, weekly, and monthly performance targets for call volume, conversion rates, and sales revenue. Handle customer objections and concerns effectively, striving to overcome obstacles and close sales. Collaborate with the sales team to share insights, feedback, and best practices for improving sales performance. Adhere to company policies and procedures, including compliance with telemarketing regulations and ethical standards. Participate in training sessions and skill development activities to enhance sales techniques and product knowledge. Preferred candidate profile   Proven experience as a tele-caller, telemarketer, or similar role, preferably in a sales or customer service environment. Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, with a clear and professional phone manner. Strong persuasion and negotiation abilities, with the confidence to make sales pitches and handle objections. Customer-focused mindset with a commitment to delivering a positive customer experience. Ability to work well under pressure and meet tight deadlines while maintaining composure and professionalism. Familiarity with CRM software and call center tools for managing leads, tracking calls, and recording interactions. Basic computer skills and proficiency in using Microsoft Office applications. High school diploma or equivalent; additional education or training in sales or customer service is a plus. Resilience and persistence in pursuing leads and achieving sales targets. Willingness to work flexible hours, including evenings and weekends, to accommodate customer preferences and achieve sales goals. column2: The role of the Field Marketing Analyst, Salesforce Innovation Centre,         is to help facilitate the execution and delivery of executive customer meetings within the Salesforce Innovation Centre (SIC)       The successful candidate will work closely with the SIC Strategist and be an integral part of the end to end meeting execution process, starting with triaging the incoming meeting requests, through to scheduling kick off calls and project managing deliverables such as the speaker briefing calls, presentation deck and the customer-facing agenda, and finally through to planning and delivering a seamless executive customer experience on the day     The position requires strong logistical and organisational skills and the ability to work closely with stakeholders across different parts of Salesforce, as well as with external agencies, to ensure the success of these meetings     This is a dynamic position for someone interested in developing Marketing and project management skills and developing experience in executive briefing strategy     Potential career paths leading from this role could include a role as a Strategist in the SIC team, or a career in marketing events         Responsibilities:             Drive coordination of customer meetings in     o     ur Salesforce Innovation Centre, including triaging the queue of meeting requests and directing to a member of the Strategy team             Work closely with the SIC Strategist and Sales teams to operationally support and ensure the success of SIC engagements at our Hyderabad SIC             Research and understand customers visiting the SIC and develop creative ideas to deliver exceptional, personalised customer experiences during SIC engagements.              Oversee all meeting logistics, including SIC experiences, room and speaker calendar scheduling, catering coordination, and room readiness to ensure seamless engagement execution             Build strong working relationships and coordinate On-Site Logistics with internal stakeholders across Real Estate & Workplace Services, IT and Security              Greet Salesforce and customer executives, and facilitate swift guest registration             Work directly with SIC Strategist to gain an understanding of goals of the meeting and each discussion topic              Source and schedule all internal Discussion Leaders/Executives for each SIC Meeting, including scheduling speaker briefing calls, clarification of schedules and              Create the presentation slide deck and agenda print file for each meeting             Build, maintain, and update Salesforce tools and dashboards to capture, measure and share our key metrics and KPIs of our program including drafting a weekly comms to All Marketing with a status update of the SIC program             Manage the quarterly budget, including raising purchase orders to suppliers, ensuring budget is 100% spent             Required Skills and Experience:             Experience in customer-facing roles, executive meetings and/or event management              Team-oriented, with a keen eye for detail and a strong ability to collaborate with partners and various support models           Experience working with Executives and Senior Leaders is also a bonus         Committed to ensuring customer satisfaction and delivering flawless customer experiences         Exceptional written and verbal communication skills         Strong organisational skills - must be    very    detail-oriented and be able to manage multiple tasks and projects simultaneously           Strong interpersonal abilities to build rapport and influence across various teams, elevating the overall meeting experience.

column2: The Sales Executive for Lubricants and Greases is responsible for promoting and selling lubricant and grease products to a diverse range of customers, including automotive, industrial, and commercial clients. The role requires developing and implementing effective sales strategies, building strong customer relationships, and achieving sales targets. The ideal candidate will possess a deep understanding of the lubricant and grease industry, exceptional communication skills, and a proven track record in sales. Key Responsibilities: Sales and Business Development: Identify and target potential customers in various sectors, including automotive, industrial, and commercial. Develop and implement effective sales strategies to meet and exceed sales targets. Conduct market research to identify new business opportunities and stay updated on industry trends. Customer Relationship Management: Build and maintain strong relationships with existing and prospective customers. Understand customer needs and provide tailored lubricant and grease solutions. Conduct regular follow-ups to ensure customer satisfaction and address any issues or concerns. Product Knowledge and Presentation: Maintain a comprehensive understanding of lubricant and grease products, including their properties, applications, and benefits. Prepare and deliver compelling sales presentations and product demonstrations to customers. Provide technical support and detailed product information to assist customers in making informed purchasing decisions. Negotiation and Closing Sales: Negotiate pricing, terms, and conditions with customers to close sales deals. Prepare and submit accurate sales quotations, proposals, and contracts. Ensure timely follow-up on sales inquiries and finalize sales transactions. Market Analysis and Reporting: Monitor market trends, competitor activities, and customer feedback to identify opportunities for growth. Prepare and submit regular sales reports, including sales performance, forecasts, and market insights. Provide feedback to management on market trends, customer preferences, and product requirements. Collaboration and Coordination: Coordinate with the supply chain and logistics teams to ensure timely delivery of products. Collaborate with the marketing team to develop promotional materials and campaigns to drive sales. Participate in trade shows, exhibitions, and industry events to promote products and network with potential customers. Compliance and Documentation: Ensure compliance with company policies, industry regulations, and safety standards. Maintain accurate records of sales activities, customer interactions, and transactions. Handle administrative tasks related to sales, including order processing, invoicing, and follow-up. Qualifications: Bachelors degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Engineering, or a related field. Proven experience as a Sales Executive or in a similar sales role within the lubricant and grease industry. Strong knowledge of lubricant and grease products and their applications. Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills. Ability to build and maintain strong customer relationships. Proficiency in using CRM software and Microsoft Office applications. Strong organizational and time management abilities. Self-motivated, results-oriented, and able to work independently. Willingness to travel frequently to meet customers and attend industry events. Working Conditions: Primarily based in an office environment, with frequent travel to customer sites, trade shows, and industry events. Regular interaction with customers, supply chain teams, and other stakeholders. Standard working hours, with flexibility to work additional hours to meet sales targets and customer needs. Physical demands include traveling, standing during presentations, and occasionally lifting promotional materials. The role of the Sales Executive for Lubricants and Greases is crucial in driving sales growth and expanding the customer base. This position requires strong sales acumen, excellent relationship-building skills, and a thorough understanding of the lubricant and grease industry and its various customer segments. For Maharashtra The candidate form Mumbai Kudus,Thane,Pune,Palghar May apply To contact HR 9047098030 Drop your cv to sethuraman.s@cielhr.com
column11: Industrial Sales, Lubricants, Grease

column1: Assistant Team Lead, Marketing Operations, Global Demand Center
column2: Job Title:  Assistant Team Lead, Marketing Operations, Global Demand Center Job Description: Cvents Global Demand Center (GDC) team is seeking a modern marketer to join the team as a  ATL.   As the Marketing Operations ATL, you will play a critical role in driving projects that contribute to marketing transformation by translating long-term concepts and vision into practical and functional initiatives. Collaborating with Marketing leadership, you will create systems and procedures that align marketing strategies and activities with organizational needs while communicating timely progress towards goals.   You will play a crucial role in developing and optimizing the execution processes for end-to-end marketing campaigns, with a focus on scalability and operational efficiencies. Your responsibilities will include owning and administering the project management tool used by the marketing team, such as Wrike or Trello, and configuring and customizing the tool to meet the specific needs and workflows of the marketing team. Collaboration with cross-functional teams, including marketing, sales, and creative teams, will be essential to understand their requirements and optimize the tool's capabilities to support efficient campaign execution and day-to-day work.   If you are a results-driven marketing operations professional with a passion for project management and driving organizational excellence, we invite you to apply. Join our team and be part of shaping the future of marketing within our organization. What You Will Be Doing: Develop and      optimize the execution processes for end-to-end marketing campaigns,      focusing on scalability and operational efficiencies. Own and administer      the project management tool used by the marketing team for marketing      campaigns ??Wrike/Trello Configure and      customize the tool to meet the specific needs and workflows of the      marketing team. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including marketing, sales, and creative teams, to understand their requirements and optimize the tool's capabilities to support efficient campaign execution, day to day work of these teams or bigger roadmap initiatives. Build scalable capabilities and workflows that enhance marketing effectiveness, execution, and overall operational efficiency. Identify and implement process improvements to streamline campaign execution, reduce bottlenecks, and increase productivity. Stay up-to-date with the latest features, updates, and best practices of the project management tool, and recommend enhancements or improvements to drive continuous improvement. Collaborate with stakeholders to identify opportunities for integration with other marketing tools or systems to streamline workflows. Stay up-to-date with industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies in marketing operations and project management. Foster a culture of continuous improvement, operational excellence, and project management best practices within the marketing team. Provide thought leadership and support to marketing team members on how to effectively use the project management tool. What You Need for this Position: Bachelor's degree in marketing, business, or a related field. 4-6 years of experience in marketing operations Strong understanding of end-to-end marketing campaign management and process optimization. Proven experience in developing new capabilities or enhancing existing capabilities to improve marketing effectiveness and execution. Proficiency with project management tools such as Wrike and Trello. Strong project management skills and experience utilizing project management methodologies and tools (e.g., Agile, Scrum, Kanban, Trello, Asana). Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to interpret data and provide actionable insights, advance excel is a must Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams globally. Experience with marketing technology platforms and tools (e.g., marketing automation, CRM) is a plus. Project Management Professional (PMP) certification is a plus. Excellent technical skills to configure, customize, and troubleshoot the project management tool. Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple priorities simultaneously. Detail-oriented with a focus on delivering high-quality work.   Skills Project management Marketing operations, end-to-end marketing campaigns  Campaign management Process optimization Process management Campaign planning and scoping Agile scrum/Kanban Methodology Program management Tools Excellent written communication skills Critical thinking and analytical skills Campaign management Marketing automation Process optimization Workflow management Technical proficiency Attention to detail Analytical skills Communication skills Collaboration Problem-solving Conflict management Tool administration
column11: Project Management, Marketing Automation, Process Optimization, Campaign Management, Stakeholder Management

column2: Position Overview: We are seeking a skilled and experienced Shopify Manager to oversee the development, implementation, and growth of our Shopify website. The ideal candidate will possess a deep understanding of e-commerce operations, and Shopify functionality, and have a proven track record of driving online sales growth. Moreover, proficiency in merchandising and website marketing strategies is crucial for this role. Key Responsibilities: Shopify Store Management: Manage the day-to-day operations of the Shopify platform, ensuring smooth functionality and optimal performance. Regularly update product listings, pricing, and promotions to keep the website current and engaging. Data-driven merchandising strategies to showcase products effectively and drive sales, including product categorization, cross-selling, and upselling techniques. E-commerce Strategy: Develop and execute strategic plans to increase online sales and brand imagery Conduct market research and stay informed about industry trends to identify opportunities for growth and innovation. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate e-commerce initiatives with overall marketing and business objectives. Website Optimization: Utilize Shopify analytics and other tools to track key performance metrics and identify areas for improvement. Coordinate on website design, layout, and navigation to maximize usability and conversion rates Implement SEO best practices to improve search engine rankings and drive organic traffic to the website Merchandising and Product Presentation: Develop merchandising strategies to highlight key products, promotions, and seasonal offerings. Coordinate with the marketing team to create visually appealing product displays, banners, and landing pages in line with marketing channels Conduct A/B testing and analyse user behaviour to optimize product placement and presentation for maximum conversion. Customer Experience: Ensure a seamless and user-friendly shopping experience across all devices and channels. Implement customer feedback mechanisms and utilize data-driven insights to continuously enhance the online shopping experience. Qualifications: Proven experience managing Shopify or similar e-commerce platforms, with a strong understanding of website management principles and best practices. Proficiency in Shopify administration, including product management, order processing, and customization. Solid understanding of e-commerce analytics, SEO, digital marketing strategies, merchandising techniques, and website marketing tactics. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively across departments and communicate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders. Strong problem-solving abilities and attention to detail, with a focus on delivering high-quality results in a fast-paced environment. Prior experience in the retail or e-commerce industry is preferred
