column2: The Sales Executive for Primary, Secondary, Channel, and Project Sales of Steels, TMT, and Steel Pipes is responsible for generating sales across multiple channels and project segments. This role involves identifying potential customers, developing strong relationships, understanding customer needs, and providing tailored product solutions. The ideal candidate will have a strong sales background, excellent communication skills, and in-depth knowledge of the steel industry. Key Responsibilities: Primary Sales: Identify and target primary market customers, including large construction companies, infrastructure projects, and government contracts. Develop and implement sales strategies to achieve primary sales targets. Conduct market research to identify new opportunities and stay updated on industry trends. Secondary Sales: Focus on secondary market customers, such as small to medium-sized construction firms and local contractors. Build and maintain strong relationships with secondary market customers. Provide product information and technical support to assist customers in their purchasing decisions. Channel Sales: Develop and manage relationships with distributors and dealers to drive channel sales. Implement channel sales strategies and promotional activities to boost sales through distribution partners. Conduct regular visits to distributor and dealer locations to monitor performance and provide support. Project Sales: Identify and pursue project sales opportunities in the construction, infrastructure, and manufacturing sectors. Work closely with project managers, engineers, and procurement teams to understand project requirements and provide suitable product solutions. Prepare and deliver compelling sales presentations and proposals for project tenders. Customer Relationship Management: Build and maintain strong relationships with existing and prospective customers across all sales channels. Conduct regular follow-ups to ensure customer satisfaction and address any issues or concerns. Provide exceptional customer service and support throughout the sales process. Negotiation and Closing Sales: Negotiate pricing, terms, and conditions with customers to close sales deals. Prepare and submit accurate sales quotations, proposals, and contracts. Ensure timely follow-up on sales inquiries and finalize sales transactions. Market Analysis and Reporting: Monitor market trends, competitor activities, and customer feedback to identify opportunities for growth. Prepare and submit regular sales reports, including sales performance, forecasts, and market insights. Provide feedback to management on market trends, customer preferences, and product requirements. Collaboration and Coordination: Coordinate with the production, logistics, and customer service teams to ensure timely delivery of products. Collaborate with the marketing team to develop promotional materials and campaigns to drive sales. Participate in trade shows, exhibitions, and industry events to promote products and network with potential customers. Compliance and Documentation: Ensure compliance with company policies, industry regulations, and safety standards. Maintain accurate records of sales activities, customer interactions, and transactions. Handle administrative tasks related to sales, including order processing, invoicing, and follow-up. Qualifications: Bachelors degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Engineering, or a related field. Proven experience as a Sales Executive or in a similar sales role within the steel industry. Strong knowledge of steel products, including TMT bars and steel pipes, and their applications. Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills. Ability to build and maintain strong customer relationships. Proficiency in using CRM software and Microsoft Office applications. Strong organizational and time management abilities. Self-motivated, results-oriented, and able to work independently. Willingness to travel frequently to meet customers and attend industry events. Working Conditions: Primarily based in an office environment, with frequent travel to customer sites, trade shows, and industry events. Regular interaction with customers, production teams, logistics, and other stakeholders. Standard working hours, with flexibility to work additional hours to meet sales targets and customer needs. Physical demands include traveling, standing during presentations, and occasionally lifting promotional materials. The role of the Sales Executive for Primary, Secondary, Channel, and Project Sales of Steels, TMT, and Steel Pipes is crucial in driving sales growth and expanding the customer base. This position requires strong sales acumen, excellent relationship-building skills, and a thorough understanding of the steel industry and its various sales channels. Candidate from Madurai,Theni,Virudhunagar,Ramanadhapuram, May apply Contact HR 9047098030 Drop your cv to sethuraman.s@cielhr.com
column11: Secondary Sales, Distribution Channel Sales, Primary Sales

column2: Job Summary:  Lokmanya Multipurpose Co-operative Society is seeking an experienced and strategic-minded  CRM (Customer Relationship Management) personnel to join our team at the Head Office in Pune. CRM personnel will be responsible for developing and implementing effective customer relationship programs and strategies to enhance customer satisfaction and loyalty. The ideal candidate should have a minimum of 4 years of experience in any industry, with expertise in CRM programs, loyalty programs, and customer engagement. A postgraduate degree in Marketing or a related field will be advantageous. Responsibilities:  Develop and implement comprehensive CRM strategies and programs to build and strengthen customer relationships.  Create and oversee loyalty programs to enhance customer retention and drive repeat business.  Define and monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure the effectiveness of CRM initiatives and loyalty programs.   Conduct market research and analyze customer data to identify customer preferences, needs, and trends.  Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration of CRM initiatives across various departments.  Implement CRM software and systems to manage customer data, communication, and engagement.  Design and execute targeted marketing campaigns to engage and nurture customer relationships.  Develop and maintain customer segmentation strategies for personalized communication and offerings.  Monitor customer feedback and complaints, and implement strategies to address and resolve customer issues.  Stay updated with industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies in CRM and customer engagement  Train and mentor team members on CRM practices, systems, and customer-centric approaches  Prepare regular reports and presentations on CRM performance and present findings to management Qualifications and Experience:  Minimum 4 years of experience in a customer-centric role in any industry.  Strong knowledge and experience in developing and implementing CRM strategies and programs.  Post-graduate degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field is preferred.  Expertise in CRM software, data management, and customer analytics.  Experience in designing and executing loyalty programs.  Strong analytical skills to interpret customer data and insights.  Excellent communication, interpersonal, and leadership skills.  Proven ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams.  Strong problem-solving abilities and attention to detail.  Male candidates within the age range of 30-45 will be considered for this position.

column2: Job Title:  Marketing Executive (Digital & On-Ground) Location:  Chennai Job Description: We are looking for a highly motivated and versatile Marketing Manager to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in both digital marketing strategies and on-ground marketing tactics. The Marketing Manager will be responsible for developing and executing comprehensive marketing campaigns to increase brand awareness, generate leads, and drive customer acquisition. This role requires a strategic thinker with excellent leadership skills who can effectively manage multiple projects and collaborate with cross-functional teams. Responsibilities: 1. Develop and implement digital marketing strategies to enhance online presence, drive website traffic, and increase customer engagement. 2. Plan and execute targeted digital campaigns across various channels, including social media, email marketing, search engine optimization (SEO), and pay-per-click (PPC) advertising. 3. Analyze digital marketing metrics and KPIs to measure campaign performance, identify areas for improvement, and optimize conversion rates. 4. Create compelling content for digital platforms, including website copy, blog posts, social media posts, and email newsletters. 5. Manage social media accounts and engage with followers to build brand loyalty and foster positive relationships with customers. 6. Collaborate with internal teams to develop marketing collateral, including brochures, flyers, and promotional materials, for on-ground marketing initiatives. 7. Plan and coordinate on-ground marketing events, such as seminars, workshops, and trade shows, to connect with potential customers and promote our services. 8. Evaluate the effectiveness of on-ground marketing activities and adjust strategies as needed to maximize results and ROI. 9. Stay informed about industry trends, market developments, and competitor activities to identify opportunities for growth and innovation. 10. Supervise and mentor marketing team members, providing guidance and support to help them achieve their goals and develop their skills. Qualifications: 1. Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related field; Master's degree preferred. 2. Proven experience in digital marketing, with a strong understanding of online advertising platforms, social media management tools, and website analytics. 3. Demonstrated success in developing and implementing digital marketing campaigns that drive results and achieve business objectives. 4. Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to create engaging content for diverse audiences. 5. Strong project management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks, meet deadlines, and manage multiple projects simultaneously. 6. Creative thinker with a strategic mindset and the ability to think outside the box to develop innovative marketing strategies. 7. Leadership qualities with the ability to inspire and motivate team members to achieve excellence. 8. Detail-oriented with strong analytical skills and the ability to interpret data to make informed decisions. 9. Experience in the financial services industry is a plus. 10. Proficiency in digital marketing tools and software, such as Google Analytics, AdWords, Facebook Ads Manager, and email marketing platforms. Salary : 25k Interested prospects can apply to kinnera259@gmail.com Regards, HR Manager
